Wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ teri min kikɔm lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Aŋtyos ànɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày wɔɔ, jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ reɓsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rì Bɛ̀ll à geesɛ̀n, ɓisuu kisay ki ɓɛ kighày kiǹ.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki wɔɔ, ɓɛ kpaa ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ kikì, à ɓiisɛ̀n rìnɛm ɗi à nɛmgà ɓum ɓɛ zɛy bee inɛ ɓɛɛ gherɛn girig nyi.
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ Pɛsɛ̀ngày a Zyude ɓɛ yu a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìrèrèsì ɗi ɓɛgherɛ̀n di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ì ɓì kɛ̀rɛɛ ɓi, yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, ɓì yin lɛ ɓì ghɛn cɛɓ.

Fɔɔnnɛ coo kiyoòyòò ki kpighà, dì Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ mɛ teɗ rirèsàg ɗi ɓumɓɛ̀n nyoey, ɓɛ ren min lɛ, rì Pol rì Ɓarinaɓas rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔɔ̀gh a Yorisalɛm lɛ, ɓɛɛ ghɛn ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ fiɓi kìɓan kiǹ.

Kìseŋi ki ki a Aŋtyos ki faghà ɓɔ ɓyom ɓi ɓi kɔ̀ɔ̀kɔ̀nɛ̀ngà ɓi rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyaa: Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ fyeeghà a Fenisii rì a Samari di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa ɓɛgeni ɓaa rilɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɗi ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll. Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n à faghà ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛǹ coo kinyàà ɓi ǹɗem.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Yorisalɛm nni kìseŋi rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ghaɓkà ɓɔ, fɔɔnnɛ Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ resìghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà rì ɓɔ.

Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kìristɛ̀n, ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɛ̀raagh, ɓɛ kì kàŋ ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ fiɓi kìɓan kiǹ.

Di ɓaa nyolɛn lɛɛ̀gwey, nni Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Ɓì yii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà mɛ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn lɔŋ a rìtumɛ̀n lɛ, nkali Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ a ɓum ɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, lɛ i ɓɛ woogh Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ gherɛn Bɛ̀ll.
Nni Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à yii mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓum, àa ǹɗèsii lɛ à ghàɓi ɓɔ, yɛ̀ɛ àa ǹfaa ɓɔ girig Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à faghà ɓìsi;
àa ǹɗèsii ɓi ǹɗèè ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ rì ɓìsi rì ɓɔ, àa ǹtɛɛ̀zii ɓɔ mɛ̀rem lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓɛ ǹgherɛɛ nyi.
Nni lannɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓi feèghrɛn Bɛ̀ll, yɛ̀ɛ ɓi kìki lɛ ɓi tɛgsi ɓɛ̀yilàg ǹtɛ̀g wu wu kighà lɛ, wu yag ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis, wu ki yag ti ɓisi rìtɛ̀g?
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìsii gherɛɛ lɛ Bɛ̀ll à mɛ ghɛɓsi ɓisi lɛ geesɛ̀n ì Kan Yeesus lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔ girig.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà a rìghàdà ɗiǹ ɓɛ maaghà lɛ fyòoog, ɓɛ wowòg yɛ̀ɛ Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ, rì dàm yi ɓiɓan, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà rì ɓɔ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum ɓɛ zɛy.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ lègsìghà ɓìtòkì, nni Zyag à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à kpaa lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Wooghna girig rìkpaa ɗyɛ̀m!
Simɔn àa rèsii ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ ki kilɛ̀ngà a rìtumɛ̀n lɛ, Bɛ̀ll a ɓɔn kìlɔ̀ŋ ki kɛɛ ɓa kiŋkii, ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi zɛy.
Kìɓan kiǹ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ gì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ìnɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ:
Kan lɛ, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ǹɗi sugtii gɛs̀ m̀pɛ̀sì mɛɛ mɛ Davit mɛ mɛ kpilàkà; fɔɔnnɛ m̀pègsaagh gɛ jàŋ yi yi ri yìwààrɛn, m̀pɛ̀ɛ̀zì mɔ kì rɛsii.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kaa gɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ Kan, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyɛɛ rereŋi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m.
Rìkalì ɗi Kan ànɛ à rèsìghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ à tumɛ̀n fìɗyàɓ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗìn.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ lɛ, tyɛ̀ ki rììsi ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛɛ mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll ǹtɛ̀g ɓi nyoo.

Tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ ɓɔ kì kàni kaàtà, ti kpaa ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì cèlii lɛ: rì riɗi ɗi ɓituwe ɓi ɓɛ woli ɓisuu riɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn, rì tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì rìɗi ɗi ɓituwe ɓi ɓi wii lɛ swììɗ bwaɓ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaŋ.
Ɓisuulɛ à tumɛ̀n ɓi gbàà yi ajɛ̀m, bàn yìcèm yi ri rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rèeresàg ɓum ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓaàyì ɓyɔ ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ Saɓàt.

Nni fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn rì kìseŋi kìcèm ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔǹ ɓum ɓɛɗɛŋ ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, di ɓɛɛ rom ɓɔ nɗaŋ ri Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas a Aŋtyos. Nni ɓɛ ɓɔngà min lɛ, rì Zyuudɛ ànɛ ɓɛ nɗegàg tì lɛ Ɓarisaɓas, rì Silas. Kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn ki ɓaghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ keesìghà lɛɛ̀gwey.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ romgà ɓɔ rì kaàtà ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkànɛn fɛlɛ̀: Ɓɛ̀geni ɓin ɓɛ lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, ɓɛ togsaghiì mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa, ɓɛ ɓì yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛ ɓì kɔ̀kɔrii a Aŋtyos, rì a Sirii, ri a Silisii.
Tìi nwoogh lɛ, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ yì fɛ, ɓìsi tyɛ̀ ki rom yi ɓɔ, ɓɛ yu mìni kì ɓùùsii, ɓɛ ki syaŋdi mini mɛ̀rem rì ɓìtòkì ɓyaa.
Fɔɔnnɛ tìi n-yɔɔsii jɛ̀ɛ̀ bog lɛ: Ti ɓɔǹ ɓumɓɛ tì romiì a lɔ̀ŋkin ǹɗaŋ ɗi Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas, ɓɛ ɓɛ rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ǹɗem.
Ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ kàɓɓɛn ɓɔmiɗ ɓisuu kisay ki Yeesus Kiris Kan wìs.
Nni tì romiì mìni lɛ, rì Zyuudɛ rì Silas lɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛɛ kpaàti mìni ɓìɓan ɓi tì kàniì ɓi.
Lɛ rì ɓìsiì ɓɔmìɗ rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, tìi nghɛɛ lɛ, tyɛ̀ ki tɛ̀gsi ti mìni ǹtɛ̀g wudɛŋ, i ki cee ɓi lɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓì ɓi ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓèŋi, ɓi ɓi ri lɛ:
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɗi ɓyɛn ɓi nyàm ìnɛ ɓɛ woli ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn, rì bwaɓ, rì ɓyɛn ɓi nyàm ìnɛ ì wii lɛ swììɗ, kɛ̀ ɓi kì tisɔ̀mɔ̀g, i ɓì lɛɛgh ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, di ɓì konaagh, ÒO òona yàà!
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romgà ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ kɛngà min a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ, lɛ ɓɛɛ fa ɓɔ kaàtà ànɛ ɓɛ kangày ɓɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓalà nyi, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ nyaàrɛ̀n, lɛ à tèèsìghà ɓɔ nyòò.
Zyuudɛ ɓɛɛ̀ Silas ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tokàkà rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛǹ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ teèsì ɓɔ nyoo, ɓɛ ki sììrag ɓɔ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ Silas ɓɛɛ̀ Zyuudɛ ɓɛ kɔrìghà wɔɔ lèg àdɛŋ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ ghesɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, ɓɛ kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì kɛ̀n lɛ fyòoog; nni ɓɛ sugtìghà min a ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ ɓɛ romgày ɓɔ
(Kìɓan kifog Silas à ghɛngà lɛ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì rɔ̀ɓi a Aŋtyos).
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ rɔ̀ɓkà a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ ɓasɛ̀n ɗì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓi rìrèrèsì rì ɓi rìkakàlì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kan.
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ru mɛ ghaghìghà foo, Pol à kpaa Ɓarinaɓas lɛ: Ti sugtiina kì ghɛɛ̀ ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ɓi bàn yi tìi nkpaa Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kan wɔɔ, lɛ ti ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ri,
Ɓarinaɓas à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ ǹɗaŋ ɗi Zyaŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Marikus,
wɔ̀lɛ Pol à gherɛ̀ngà ɓi lɛ ɓɛɛ Kɛǹ ɗì Zyaŋ, ɓisuulɛ, à rinìghà ɓɔ a Paŋfilii, kɛ̀ɛ ki teeti gàɓ ɓi kìsay ki ɓɛ kɛngà kì kìi.
Ɓɛ nyolɛ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛ syɔngà kì ghasɛɛ, lɛ rì mum à ròŋì bee yiì, fɔɔnnɛ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛɛ̀ Marikus ɓɛ ɓɔkà kìkɔm, ɓɛ kɛǹ a Siipirɛ.
Pol nyii tekà Silas ɓɔɔ kɛǹ, dì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ mɛ reɓsɛn ɓɔ rì geesɛ̀n ì Kan.
Fɔɔnnɛ à fyeeghà a Sirii rì a Silisii di a tèeteèsì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ nyoo ɓi rìgherɛ̀n.
Nni Pol à kɛ̀ngà kì kpaŋì a Dɛriɓɛ, rì a Listirɛ n-yilàg àdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ ɗii lɛ Timote, jɛɛ wìì a ɓaghà ǹgherɛ̀n, gɔ̀n ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, seŋi muu Gìrɛg,
ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ a Listirɛ rì ɓɛ a Ikonyɔm ɓɛ sɛsɛ̀kà nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à kɔ̀ngà lɛ a teɗ nyi, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ; yɛ̀ɛ à ki tekà nyi, à kɛ̀ɗ nyi, lɛ à rirìsìghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ, lɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yighà lɛ seŋi Timote à ɓaghà muu Gìrɛg.
Ɓi bàn yìcèm yi Pol rì Silas ɓɛ ghaghìghà wɔɔ, ɓɛ ghaàghàgsìghà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ rengà, ɓɛ ki kpaakpaa ɓum lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ̀ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ.
Ɓìseŋi ɓi mɛ tetèkà ìtèɗ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ì ɓɔɓɔ̀g m̀ɓɔɓɔghɛn ɓɛŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kì rekà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghagsi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ɓi kìden ki zi ki a Azii fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaghìghà bàn ì Firizii, rì zi ì Ɓɛ̀gàlat rì mɛ̀kòò.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà jàŋbog rì Misii, nni ɓɛ kaaghà bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Bitinii, kìɓan kifog Nghay à Yeesus kɛ̀ɛ gherɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ syaàghà min zi inɛ a Misii, ɓɛ kɛǹ a Tirowas.
Nni ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀ ɓi kighà Pol rì ìru lɛ à ghɛɛ ŋwaànɛ a Masedwan mɛ̀rɛy, à ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàg nyi lɛ: Yu a Masedwan, u ghɛɓsi ɓìsi.
Ajɛ̀m ì ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm ɓi Pol ɓiǹ, nnɛ tì ghàskà kì kaà bee ìnɛ lɛ ti kɛǹ a Masedwan, lɛ tì konàkà kì ghɛɛ̀ lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ regii ɓìsi lɛ, ti kɛǹ kì kalii Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ wɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì tekà kìkɔm a Tirowas, tì kɛ̀n lɔŋ kilomì ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày ki lɛ, Samotiras, ɓi duri tana tì kɛ̀n a Neyapolis,
wɔɔnnɛ tì pɛ̀sɛɛ, tì kɛ̀n a Filiɓ, ànɛ à rì ǹtonto à bàn ànɛ a Masedwan, à ki ɓa ti bàn ìnɛ ɓumɓɛ a Rom ɓɛ lamìì; tì kɔ̀rìghà ɓi bàn ìnɛn, bàlì ì mɛ̀ru.

Nni ŋwosì Saɓàt, tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi bàn, tì kɛ̀n ɓi bèn ì ǹsyòm, ɓi jàŋ inɛ tì fèfèkà lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ ɓa rì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n wɔɔ. Yɛ̀ɛ tì kɔ̀rìghà ɓi zi, nni tì tòkàkà rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛtaŋzɛn.

Giɓ àdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ ɗii lɛ Lidyaa àa m̀ɓɔgsàg Bɛ̀ll, à ɓaghà ǹkìì-dùne ì ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓilàà ɓi ɓàŋ ɓi bàn ì Tyatiir, à ramgà mɛ̀reè lɛ syeesyee lɛ a wog ɓìtòkì ɓis, fɔɔnnɛ Kan à nɛmgà nyi ǹɗem lɛ a konag kì woògh ɓìtòkì ɓi Pol.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà lɛ rì nyi, rì naa yìì i ɓum nni à tɔkà ɓìsi lɛ, ti kɛǹ a mɛɛ mii, à kpaa lɛ: I ɓì ghɛɛ lɛ ǹɗì ǹgherɛ̀n Kan, yùuna kì kɔ̀rii a mɛɛ mɛm̀. Fɔɔnnɛ à sììrɛ̀ngà lɛ ti gherɛn lɛ, ti kɔri à lɔ̀ŋkii.

Yɛ̀ɛ tì kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà ŋwos adɛŋ ɓi jàŋ i bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nni tì tulɛ̀ngà rì gɔ̀n ì giɓ idɛŋ ìnɛ ì ɓaghà ɓiì sasali ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ; ì ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay, ki ki fafàghà yɔ̀ ìtèɗ wulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ log kì yiì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀masà ɓii ɓɛ fɔ̀nfɔ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi ɓìfyeŋ ɓii ɓiǹ.

Nni ì tumɛ̀ngà ɓìsi rìnɔ̀ɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tì lɛ, rì ɓìsi rì Pol, di yɛ̀ɛ kpaakpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ à cee, ɓɛɛ̀ kakali mini ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi fa mìni cɛɓ.

Ɓàlì ì mɛ̀ru ì ghaghìghà lɛɛ̀gwey ŋwutyàà giɓ anɛ̀n à kɛ̀nkɛ̀n lɔŋ asu à kpaakpàà fɔlɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ bim ì ɓaghà lɛ ì mɛ naasag Pol, à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n à kpaa kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ki ɓaghà ɓi giɓ anɛ̀n lɛ: Ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus Kiris, ǹtɔɔgh wɔ̀ lɛ, u pɛsɛn ɓi giɓ ànɛ. Nni kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ghàskà kì pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi gom yɔ̀miɗ inɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀masà ɓɛ giɓ anɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ bee yaà ì rìfɔ̀n ìnɛn ì simɓɛɛ, nni ɓɛ ɓangà lɛ, rì Pol rì Silas, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì ɓɔ ɓi jàŋ ì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yuu rì kìɓùùsì ɓi bàn yìs, ɓɛncèm ɓɛ ki rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n;
ɓɛɛ rèeresàg ɓum ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓidɛŋ, ɓi ɓìsi Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ tì yin ri ìtèɗ wulɛ, tì teɗ, nsoò lɛ tì ɗiŋì miì.
Fɔɔnnɛ gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ, ì wokà bim ri Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Silas, ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ kpaa lɛ, ɓɛɛ kori ɓɔ ɓìlàà ɓi nyoo ɓɛ ki ɓog ɓɔ kìtòn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓaàgh lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ ɓog ɓɔ kìtòn fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ piìg min ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày, ɓɛ kalì m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày lɛ, a ɓeŋ ɓɔ, lèg ànɛ lɛ àdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɗim.
Yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓèŋì naà-zày à wokà fɔlɔɔ, à pìg ɓɔ ɓi kìden ki naa ki ki ɓaghà lɔŋ wɔɔ ɓi naà-zày ɓi ɗùùm, à ki pùrag ɓɔ mɛ̀kòò ɓi ɓìɓèg.
Di ǹɗem-irù wu ti jàŋbog, Pol rì Silas ɓɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ kɛkɛ̀ɛ̀gh tyem ti lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll, ɓìmbùŋ ɓimbog ɓi wowòg yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛkɛ̀ghìghà.
Nni zi i ghàskà kì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛɛ ri ìtèɗ lèg ànɛ lɛ mɛɛ mɛ naà-zày mɛ kpikɛ̀ngà, ɓìsìm ɓìcèm ɓi ghas kì ŋwàrɛɛ, bɛn yi ɓimbùŋ ɓìcèm yi fumɓàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à fòsɛ̀ngày ɓi fìlo, à ghɛn mɛ̀suuna mɛ naà-zày ɓìkpaŋ à sɔ̀ŋìì gàfàg yìì lɛ, a wolɛn ɓisuulɛ à fèfèkà lɛ, ɓìmbùŋ ɓìcèm ɓyaa làngii.
Nni Pol à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kìlɛn com! tì rì fɛ ɓìsi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
M̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à tɔg min lɛ ɓɛɛ fa nyi ɗuu; à ɗiŋì rì mɛ̀ree ɓi kìden ki naa, di a nìighniŋdɛ̀n lɛ kpàg-kpàg-kpàg, à kpì Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Silas a mɛ̀kòò;
fɔɔnnɛ à kpaŋzìghà ɓɔ, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀kan ɓɛ̀m! Cɛ ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi ɓisuulɛ mɓa rì cɛɓ?
Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Gherɛn Kan Yeesus, fɔɔnnɛ ù rì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ cɛɓ lɛ rì wɔ̀, rì naa yɔ̀ɔ̀ ì ɓum.
Nni ɓɛ kalìghà min nyi Ɓɔlɛ à Kan Yeesus, lɛ rì nyi rì rìmɛɛ ɗii.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, nnɛ, m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ lɛ a soò ɓɔ beŋ yi ɓɛ ɓaghà rì yɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghàskà kì ɓàɓtii lɛ rì ŋwaànɛ̀n, rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à tekà lɛ rì Pol rì Silas, à ɓɔg rì ɓɔ a mɛɛ mii, à fa ɓɔ ɓyom ɓiɗiyɛn, ŋwaànɛ̀n rì naa yìì i ɓum, ɓɛ wokà kìrɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà, ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ rom yì ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ kali m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày lɛ, à caɗ ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛɛ ghaàgh.
Nni m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à kpaaghà Pol lɛ: Ɓɛ̀làmì ɓɛ romiì ɓum lɛ, mɛ̀ ncaɗ mìni, mìnii ghaàgh, nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, kpaŋina min, ɓi kɛǹ lɛ fyòoog.

Nni Pol à kalìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romgày ɓɛǹ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀làmì ɓɛ mɛ kì lɛ, ɓɛ ɓog ɓìsi kìtòn ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, di ɓɛ ka yɔmzi ɓi ɓisi, kɔlɛ tì rì girig Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ, ɓɛ ki pìg ɓisi ɓi naà-zày nni ɓɛ ti ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kpaŋzi ɓìsi ɓi naà-zày; a rìnyam, èe èe, ɓìsii ɓenì, ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛɛ yu ɓìsi kì kpaŋzii.
Nni ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romgày ɓɛǹ ɓɛ sugtìghà kì kalii ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Pol ìnɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà lɛ ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛ ri Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ.
Nni ɓɛ yughà ɓɔ kì tɔɔ̀gh rìcenɛ̀n, ɓɛ kpaŋzì ɓɔ ɓì naà-zày, ɓɛ ki ɓɔ̀ŋzag ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn ɓi bàn ìnɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pol rì Silas ɓɛ kpagày naà-zày ɓɛ kɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Lidyaa, ɓɛ ghɛn ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ rìgherɛ̀n, ɓɛ teèsì ɓɔ nyoo, ɓɛ ghaàgh min.
Pol rì Silas ɓɛ fyeeghà a Aŋfipolis rì a Apolonii, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kpaŋì a Tesalonika, wɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà rì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ àa nti à kìlàg. À kurɛ̀ngà rì ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ, ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll, gòn yi Saɓàt yiraa.
À tɛɛ̀tɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, à rèrèsì ɓɔ lɛ, ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ, Kiris a wog rìkɛŋ, à ki ghèmɓɛn yi a ɓìloŋ; à kpaakpàà ɓɔ lɛ: Yeesus ànɛ nkakali mini ànɛ yɛɛ rì Kiris.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, ɓɛ ɓasɛ̀n ǹɗaŋ ri Pol rì Silas, rì Gìrɛg lɛɛ̀gwey ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ nɗisàg Bɛ̀ll, gàɓ ì ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ì nɔɔ̀tìghà girig ɓɔ.

Wɔ̀lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì yàaka ɓɛ reŋɗɛ̀ngày ɓumɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ yoòyòmgà ɓi bàn, ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n cììba, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɗìkì ɗi kiyoòyòò ɓi bàn. Nni ɓɛ kɛngà kì kaà lɛ rì Pol rì Silas a mɛɛ mɛ Jazɔŋ, lɛ ɓɛɛ rɛsi ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ kilɔ̀ŋ lɛ kɛɛ yɔm ɓɔ.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà ɓì ɓɔ, nni ɓɛ ɓangà lɛ rì Jazɔŋ rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ kɛǹ rì ɓɔ a ɓɛ̀làmì bàn ìnɛn ɓɛ kpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓuùsìghà ziinɛ bimiɗ, ɓɛ nkpaŋi girig fɛ ɓi bàn yìs,
Nni Jazɔŋ àa ǹghàɓi ɓɔ a mɛɛ mii; rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɗi wɛɛsɛɛ ɓi ri ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Kaaza, lɛ ɓɔɔ kalag lɛ: Rìfòm ɗidɛŋ ɗi rì wɔɔ, ɗyɛɛ ri ɗii lɛ, Yeesus.
Rìkpaa ɗìn ɗi ɓuùsìghà lɛ rì gwìy ì ɓum, rì ɓɛ̀làmì mɛ̀to ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ,
ɓɛ kagà Jazɔŋ rì ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog lɛ, ɓɛɛ peè làman ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓɛɛ càɗ ɓɔ.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ìru wu fingà, ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ ghas kì kaà bee inɛ lɛ, Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Silas ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Bere. Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà wɔɔ, ɓɛ ɗiŋì ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.

Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a Bere ɓɛ rɔɔtɛ̀ngà ǹɗem ɓɛ cee ɓɛ̀roɓɛ a Tesalonika, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaɓkà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll rì coo kinyàà, ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ fifìɓìghà kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ nkòo ɓìɓan ɓi Pol à kpaakpààghà ɓɔ, ɓi ri miì.
Kìgwey ki ɓi ɓɔ, ki gherɛ̀ngà; ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓi a Gìrɛg rì gàɓ ì ɓɛ̀baŋì ǹɗììtɛn, ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà girig.
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a Tesalonika ɓɛ wokà lɛ Pol à titì ɓiì ghaaghagsì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll a Bere, nni ɓɛ yughày wɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓuùsi jàŋ, ɓɛ ki kì kiyoòyòò ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ.
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ ghas min ki kìi lɛ Pol a kɛǹ ɓi ɓɛg à rìɓày à kìkòn, Silas rì Timote ɓɛɛ rɔɓkà lɔŋ a Bere.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɛngà kì foŋì Pol, ɓɛ kɛngà lɔŋ ǹɗaŋ ɗì nyi à kpaŋ a Atɛn, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sugtìghày min a Bere, Pol à romgì ɓɛ̀-Silas ɓɛɛ̀ Timote jɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓɔ, lɛ, ɓɛɛ nɔɔ̀tiì nyi lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ.
Cààmɛ̀n ki Pol à ɓaghà ɓiì ɓoŋɓoŋi ɓɛ̀-Silas a Atɛn, à ɓaghà rì ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ɓi ǹɗem yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà lɛ bàn ì Atɛn ì ronɛ̀ngà rì bɛ̀ll yi ɓinùn.

A nyoònyòlɛ̀ngà lɛ rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì Gìrɛg ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ǹɗisàg Bɛ̀ll; ki ɓaghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. À nyoònyòlɛ̀n tì rì ɓumɓɛ àa ǹtanàg ɓi kìyan ki ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ nkuràg wɔɔ ɓɛŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm.

Ɓɛ̀rèsàg dɔgtɛ̀n yidɛŋ yi yɛɛ, kpaakpaa lɛ ŋwaà keèsi rìyɛ̀y ɗi cɛɓ, rì lɛ, ŋwaà ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓiɓì nɗem ɓi rìkɛŋ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà girig ìkurè rì Pol, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ lɛ: Cɛ ǹkìì-kɛɛgh anɛ a kpaakpaa kɔmiɗ? Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ki pisɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ a kakali kiɓan ki bɛ̀ll yidɛŋ, yi tì yii ɓi; ɓɛ ɓakà fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ wokà di Pol a kakali Ɓɔlɛ à Yeesus, rì rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ.
Nni ɓɛ tekà Pol ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi ɓi nyìinyìm à ǹtaŋzɛn wu a Atɛn wulɛ, ayèròpaàzɛ̀ ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Tì rì nya lɛ tì yi nyɔɔnyɔn à dɔgtɛ̀n ànɛ u rèresi anɛ?
Ki ri yɛ̀ɛ u kakali ɓisi ɓìkènekènè ɓi ɓiɓan, nni ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ti kɔ̀nkɔ̀n lɛ di tyàa yii yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ri azi.
Ɓumɓɛ a Atɛn rì ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn, ɓɛ ɓaghà rì kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛ, ì duri i tani, ɓɛ kɔrì foo lɛ, ɓɛɛ kpaàkpaa, nsoò lɛ ɓɛɛ wowog ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ ɓɛ nyɔn.
Nni Pol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo ɓi nyìinyìm à ǹtaŋzɛn wulɛ, àyèròpaàzɛ̀ a kpaa lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Atɛn, mɛ̀ ǹka ghɛɛ lɛ, ɓì rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ falɛɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi mɛgherɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.

Ɓisuulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nɗerenii bàn yìn, ǹseesèè gɛ mɛɛ ànɛ ɓì togii bɛ̀ll yin; mɛ̀ɛ mɓàli kɔm̀ ɓi mɛɛ mɛdɛŋ lɛ: Mɛɛ mɛ, mɛ ri ɓisuu bɛ̀ll ìdɛŋ ìnɛ tì yii ɓi. Nni bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ɓi ɓɔɔɓɔgsì ìnɛn kɛ̀ ɓi yi yɔ̀, yɛ̀ɛnnɛ ǹ-yùu mìni kì rèsii.
Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à kìghà lɛ, rì zi rì ɗyoo, rì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi miì, nnyɛɛ ri Kan ànɛ à làmii ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm. Bɛ̀ll ànɛn à yin lɛ à kɔ̀rì ɓi mɛɛ mɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ toŋi rì ɓyàg ɓyaa.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìsay kii ki yin ɓiì tɔtɔɔgh ɓyàg ɓi ɓum lɛ kɛɛ kìlɛn, ɓisuulɛ com kidɛŋ ki kaarɛɛ ɓi nyi; nnyɛɛ ti à falàg ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm cɛɓ, rì cɔ̀ŋzɛn rì ɓyom ɓimbog ɓìcèm.
Nnyɛɛ kighà lɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓyɛɛ fuùyì ɓi mum bog, à ki kɔ̀ɔ̀si ɓyɔ ɓi zi bimiɗ; à kìghà lɛ, à wòŋzàg ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓisu waa, à ki rɛsag mɛrèè mɛ zi, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀rii.
A kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, ɗi ɓum ɓɛɛ kaàkaa nyi ɓaàyiɓi, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ghɛn nyi di ɓɛ mɛ gbɔ̀mgbɔ̀m, lɛ Bɛ̀ll à raɓsɛɛ gì ɓi ri ɓìsi;
ti ghɛghɛ̀ɓ, tì nyɛ̀ɛ̀nyɛŋɗɛ̀n, tì ki ɓa ɓum, lɛ nyi. Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ̀toŋì ɓyom ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓìsii ri gìrìg boo yìì i mum.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ tì rì lɔɔ boo ì mum ì Bɛ̀ll, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi kifèegh lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à rì lɛ à pisɛ̀n gol, nsoò mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nsoò gɔ̀g yi ɓum ɓɔ yɛɛ soɓi rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗyaa.
Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à foŋi ɓi ǹto rì ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi ɓum ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓiǹ ɓi rìɗim, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi gɛɛ̀nɛ, a rereŋi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm nsoò ɓɛ fe, nsoò ɓɛ fe, lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔghrɛn mɛ̀rem.

Ɓisuulɛ à rɛsìghà bimiɗ à ŋwos ànɛ à rì ɓiì yɔ̀mi zi bimiɗ miì, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ saaɗ a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n; à ɓɔ̀ngà mum ànɛ à rì ɓiì kìi kisay kiǹ, à fa ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm kìrèmzɛnà ki ki resii lɛ, nnyɛɛ ɓɔngà ŋwaàncèm, yɛ̀ɛ à ghèmzìghày nyi a ɓìloŋ.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wokà di Pol à ti ɓiì kpaakpaa kiɓan ki righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpusɛ̀n ɗi tyɛ̀y, ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ, tì ri wog kiŋkɔɔ kiǹ ŋwos adɛŋ.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Pol à kpagà, à ghaàgh.

Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, gàɓ ì ɓum ìdɛŋ ì nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà Pol, ì gherɛ̀n. Ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓɛǹ, Denis kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ǹtaŋzɛn wulɛ àyèròpaàzɛ̀ à ɓaghà miì, rì giɓ adɛŋ ɗii lɛ Damaris, ri ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ tì foo.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Pol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà à Atɛn à kɛ̀n a Kɔrɛŋt.

A tuusɛ̀ngà wɔɔ ri muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Akilas; ŋwaànɛ̀n à yalɛ̀ngà ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki lɛ Pɔŋ. A pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Italii ɓɛɛ̀ Pirisilya à giy, ɓisuulɛ rìfòm ɗi lɛ Kiloodɛ ɗi rengà lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Rom ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn wɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à ràrɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rìkuu ɗi kisay ɗifog, kìsay ki toŋtoŋɛn ɓilaa rì tàpot, nni Pol à kɔ̀rìghà a lɔ̀ŋkaa ɓɛ sasày ǹɗaŋ.
Gòn yi Saɓàt yìcèm, Pol àa ǹtòòghraagh ɓi naà-bɔ̀nzɛ̀n lɛ à kaakààghà bee lɛ a syoŋ̀ lɛ rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì Gìrɛg.

Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Silas rì Timote ɓɛ kpagà a Kɔrɛŋt di ɓɛ pɛsɛɛ yì a Masedwan, Pol à nagà ɓɔɔ ɓisay ɓimbog, à rɔ̀ɓ lɔŋ lɛ a kpaàkpaa ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, à kakàlì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n à ki sììrɛn lɛ, Yeesus yɛɛ ri Kiris.

Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓeèdɛ̀ngà ɓìɓan ɓi Pol à kpaakpààghà, ɓɛ ki sɛmgi nyi, fɔɔnnɛ à sàɗkà kùrùɓu ànɛ à ɓaghà nyi ɓi ɓìlàà à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ì ɓì ɗyaŋi ŋwos yɛ̀ɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ, di zɛ̀ɗ yiǹ ì mìniìɓɔmiɗ, mɛ̀ ǹ-yiìdi miì rì bɛ̀lɛn. Fɔɔnnɛ à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, ǹ-yùu kì kɛ̀ɛ a ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.
Nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo à kɛ̀n a mɛɛ mɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ àa ǹɗisàg Bɛ̀ll ɗii lɛ Tityus-Yustus, mɛɛ mii mɛ ɓaghà jàŋbog ɗì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n.
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, rìfòm ɗi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɗii lɛ Kirispus ɗi gherɛ̀ngà Kan, rì rìmɛɛ ɗii ɗicèm, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓumɓɛ a Kɔrɛŋt lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓi Pol ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà girig, ɓɛ ki ɓàɓtag.
Ɓi-ru wudɛŋ, Kan à kpaaghà Pol a ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ risi, kɛ̀na asu rì rìkakàlì ɗi ɓɔlɛ, kɔ̀ɔ mam.
Ɓisuulɛ, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ajɛ̀m, ŋwaàdɛŋ à yin lɛ à saàgh wɔ̀ càg ɓi nyoo lɛ a ki wɔ̀ kìɓe ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ ronɛɛ fɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ.
Pol à kɔ̀rìghà a Kɔrɛŋt bèg bog rì kìden di a rèresi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ Galyɔŋ à ɓaghà gɔmìnà ànɛ ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki lɛ Akayi, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔrɛ̀ngà ɓɔɔ̀cèm, ɓɛ ɓigtì paàzì rì Pol ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi ɓi naà-ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m.
Ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ a tootoòsì, ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìkuu ɗi riɓɔgsì ɗi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi reègh.

Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Pol à mɛɛ kìghà lɛ a pini ŋwɔm a toòghrɛn, Galyɔŋ à kpaa Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛǹ lɛ: Mìni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n! I kaa rì lɛ Pol à woliì mum nsoò lɛ à sɛ̀raaghiì coo kiɓan kidɛŋ, di ǹɗì lɛ ǹkɔ̀rì lɛ fyòoog ǹkonàg tì kì woògh sɔmìnà wìn yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ki rì lɛ ɓi nyoonyolɛ̀n ɓi dɔgtɛ̀n ìdɛŋ rì ɓi mii mɛdɛŋ, rì ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓin, mìniìɓɔmiɗ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kìpègsɛɛ kiɓan kin; mɛ̀ ǹ-yin lɛ ǹ-yɔ̀m ɓìɓan ɓi fɔlɔɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaŋzìghà ɓɔ ɓi naà-ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛǹ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ sɛngà ɓi Sostɛn ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹlàmì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n nyi rìɓog ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan, wɔ̀lɛ rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yeesi Galyɔŋ nsoò lɛsàg.

Pol à kɔ̀rìghà tì a Kɔrɛŋt gàɓ, fɔɔnnɛ à ghesɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ righerɛ̀n, à teɗ min kikɔm lɛ a kɛǹ a Sirii. À kɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀ngà rì Pirisilya ɓɛɛ̀ Akilas. Pol à kɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀ngà ǹto à Saŋkire ɓisuulɛ, à càrɛ̀ngà tyòŋ ɓi bɛ̀ɗ idɛŋ ìnɛ ɓɛ ǹɗegi lɛ bɛ̀ɗ i nàziryià.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Efɛɛzɛ Pol à càɗ Pirisilya wɔɔ ɓɛɛ̀ Akilas, à kɛ̀n ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n à tòkì rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ a kɔri gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru rì ɓɔ, à ɓèn.

Kìɓan kifog à ghasɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, à ki kàg ɓɔ lɛ, à rì ɓiì sugtii yi a lɔ̀ŋkaa ŋwos adɛŋ di Bɛ̀ll à kɔ̀ni. Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaghà lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, nɗi tìcàɓ ti ti riì ti a Yorisalɛm nsoò kaa ɓaa la. Nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Efɛɛzɛ ɓi fìtimà.
Yɛ̀ɛ à sɛni fìtimà à Sezare, à ɓɔg kitògsii ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛgherɛ̀n wu a Yorisalɛm, fɔɔnnɛ à sɛngà min a Aŋtyos.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ gàɓ, nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà tì, à reni zi ì Galasi bimiɗ, à ghaàgh min a Firizii, di a sìisiìràg ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi rìgherɛ̀n.
Muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Apolos, ànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà a Alɛgsaŋdirii, à kpagà a Efɛɛzɛ. Ŋwaànɛ̀n à kìghà lɛ, à yi rìlɛ̀ŋì ɗi ɓitòkì, à ki yi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛɛ̀gwey.

Ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ rèsi nyi bee ì Kan ǹɗem wii wu ki falɛn miì lɛɛ̀gwey. A kakàlìghà ɓum, à ki rèresi ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi Yeesus yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, kìɓan kifog, bàɓtis ì Zyaŋ yɛɛ̀nɛ nyii yighà yɔ̀riyɔ̀.
Nni Apolos à tumɛ̀ngà rìtòtòg ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris, yɛ̀ɛ Pirisilya rì Akilas ɓɛ wokà ɓìtòkì ɓii, nni ɓɛ tekà nyi, ɓɛ konàg nyi kì tɛɛ̀zaagh bee inɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll.

Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Apolos à fèkà lɛ a kɛǹ a Akayi, ɓɛ̀geni ɓii ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ teèsì nyi nyoo lɛ a kɛǹ, ɓɛ ki kàn ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ ghaɓ nyi lɛ syeesyee. Yɛ̀ɛ à kpàgà wɔɔ, à ɓaghà rì ǹghɛɓsɛn ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ì kìghà lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n,
lɛ àa ǹti à ciìzàg Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ di ɓɛɛ̀ ǹyoonyolɛ̀n ɓi gwìy. À rèrèsì ɓɔ, di a ɓaaɓaàzì rì kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛ, Yeesus à rì Kiris.
Cààmɛ̀n ki Apolos à ɓaa a Kɔrɛŋt, kɛɛ̀ki Pol à kìi lɛ, à mɛ rereniì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi dòn, à yù kì kpaŋì a Efɛɛzɛ, à tanɛn gàɓ ì ɓɛ̀yilàg wɔɔ, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ:
Ɓì tekà nya Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay yɛ̀ɛ ɓi gherɛ̀ngà? Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Ɓìsii ka wokà ɓì gi di ɓɛ ɓuŋi com kidɛŋ lɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay.
Nni Pol à tɔkà min ɓɔ lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi bàɓtis ɗibe ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà mìni? Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Bàɓtis ì Zyaŋ.

Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Zyaŋ à ɓààɓàɓtìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà mɛ̀rem, à kakàlì ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Isirayɛl lɛ, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì gherɛɛ roànɛ à rì nyi ɓiì ɓɔ̀ɓiì, yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ Yeesus.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, nni ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà ɓɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus.
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à saghìghà ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki sɛn yì ɓi ɓɔ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɗìtòg ɗi ɓìkènekènè ɓi ɓitòkì di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll à rèrèsìghà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kpaà.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà nunùg ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.

Nni Pol à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, à tòòghrɛ̀n wɔɔ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, à kurɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛraa ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi seesee kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, à kaakàà bee inɛ a ki lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà ɓìtòkì ɓii, ɓɛɛ gherɛn ɓìɓan ɓi à kpaakpààghà.

Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀rem mɛ̀tèɗkakɛn ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀n lɛ di ɓaa gherɛɛ, ɓɛ ki feefengì bee ì Kan ɓi mɛ̀reè mɛ ɓum, fɔɔnnɛ Pol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, à teɗ ɓɛ̀yilàg à kɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ jàŋ ìdɛŋ, à kuùkùrɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi naà-sùkurì ì Tiranus.
Kìɓan kiǹ ki finɛ̀ngà bèg yiɓɛɛ̀, kɛɛ kighà lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Azii, à tumɛ̀n lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n à kpaŋ lɛ Gìrɛg, ɓɛ wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan.
Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà Pol ìtèɗ wulɛ a kiki dàm yi ɓiɓan yi kuurakɛn,
lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ ntekì zyònà yi ɓilàà rì ɓìden ɓi ɓilàà ɓi ɓi komgà nyoo ì Pol, ɓɛ ɓaɓàɓì ɓɛ̀roroɓ miì, tìroɓ tyaa ti wɔnwɔ̀n, ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ki kpaŋkpaŋ ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n.

Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà jàŋ bimiɗ lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀nàɓì-ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ fèèghrɛ̀ngà kì nàɓi ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus, ɓɛ kpaa ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓìn lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹkpaa mìni ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus ànɛ Pol à ti à lààlàmɓɛ̀n lɛ, ɓi kpaŋ̀!
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kikìghà kìɓan kiǹ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɔn ɓɛ pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey àdɛŋ, muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɗii lɛ, Seva; ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ɓaàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii Yeesus, ǹki yi ghɛn yɛɛ rì lɛ Pol; nni mìniìɓɔmiɗ, mìnii ri ɓɛ̀ghɛn?
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà ànɛ̀n rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay à sɛngà ɓi ɓɔɔ̀cèm, à cee ɓɔ ɓi-tèɗ, à kì ɓɔ lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛ faŋɗàkày ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n di ɓɛ ti nyoo zɛ̀y, beŋ jàŋ bimiɗ.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm rì Gìrɛg bimiɗ ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà a Efɛɛzɛ, ɓɛ wokà kìɓan kiǹ, ìris wu ɓan ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ keèkèmzìghà ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus.
Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓɛ yuyùghà kì kpàkpaagh ɓì mis mɛ ɓum, ɓɛ ki rèresi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi ɓɛ kighà.

Fɔɔnnɛ kìgwey ki ɓum ki ki kikìghà majìg abɛ̀y, ki yughày rì ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓaa ɓɛ majìg, ɓɛ tɔ̀n ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm. Ɓɛ ɓalà lɛ, ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛǹ ɓɛ kpagà bàlì ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ì kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà beèbɛ̀y ɗì rìsààsàà ɓi-tèɗ wu Kan.
Ajɛ̀m ì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, Pol à ɓekà lɛ a kɛǹ a Yorisalɛm, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì syàa zi ì Masedwan rì zi ì Akayi, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ i m̀ɓaa wɔɔ, ǹkɛ̀n girig kì ghɛɛ̀ Rom.
Nni à romgà min ɓɔɓti ɓii ɓɛ kisay ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ lɛ, rì Timote rì Erast a Masedwan, nyimiɗ a rɔ̀ɓtì kì ghagsii gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Azii kiǹ.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ɓɛ ɓigtìghà coo kiyoòyòò ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee bee ì Kan.

Ǹsyaàgh-ìrɛm adɛŋ ɗii lɛ Demetiriyus àa ǹti à syakì ɓɔɔ ɓifèèghrɛnà ɓɛ mɛɛ mɛ bɛ̀ll ìnɛ lɛ Aritemis rì rìkuu ɗi swiɗ ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ kìlag mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ tiraŋ̀ miì, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à lèlèɓkà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii lɛ syeesyee.
Nni à taŋzɛ̀ngà lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii, rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ kikìghà rìkuu ɗi kisay ɗiǹ, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Ɓì yii lɛ, dìgdìg wìs a rìɓa, à rìì ɓi-rɛm wu ti syasyag wu.

Nni ɓi seesèè ɓì ki wowog, yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ lɛ Pol ànɛ à mɛ kì lɛ, à rèsàg, à ki syoŋ̀ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey, àa fɛ a Efɛɛzɛ nyi rì nyi, ɓaàyiɓi ɓi ziì Azii bimiɗ. À kpaakpàà lɛ, bɛ̀ll yi ɓum ɓɛɛ kii rì ɓyàg ɓyaa, yi yin Bɛ̀ll.

Kìɓan ki ki ɓeɓtɛɛ miì, ki yin lɔŋ lɛ, kìsay kis ki ri ɓiì sòo, ki ri girig lɛ mɛɛ mɛ coo bɛ̀ll yìs i giɓ inɛ lɛ Aritemis mɛ rì ɓiì ghalì com ki zɛy, nsoò rìgwey ɗi bɛ̀ll ìnɛn, ìnɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì ɓi ziì Azii bimiɗ, rì ziinɛ ǹcèm ɗi ri ɓiì lèegh.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, bim i kì ɓɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɗìlààlàmɓɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Aritemis ànɛ à Efɛɛzɛ à rì mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìyoòyòò ki kpighà ɓi bàn bimiɗ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ suùrɛ̀n ɓi naa ìnɛ ɓɛ ǹkìlàg tìcàɓ miì, di ɓɛ mɛ ɓan ɓumɓɛ a Masedwan lɛ rì Gayus, ri Aristarikɛ ɓɛ ɓɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀ghàg ɗì Pol.
Pol à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ a rɛli ɓi mis mɛ ɓum wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ reèg lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kì fɔlɔɔ.
Mɛ̀fòm mɛdɛŋ mɛ a Azii mɛ mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀ghan mɛ Pol, mɛ romgà nyi jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛ fèèghrɛn ki yùu ɓi naà-tìcàɓ.

Kì ɓaghà lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ syansyàn ɓi rìsyansyàn ɗyaa, ɓɛ̀roɓɛmbog, ɓɔɔ syansyàn ɓi ɗiŋkàà; kìyoòyòò ki ɓaghà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi gwìy ìnɛn, fɔɔnnɛ kìgwey ki ɓum ki yighà ɓi gi ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà.
Nni ɓɛ sɔŋìghày ŋwaàdɛŋ ɓi gwìy inɛn ɗii lɛ Alɛgsaŋdirɛ, lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n innɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ tyɔtyɔ̀kày asu. Fɔɔnnɛ Alɛgsaŋdirɛ ànɛn à maasìghà ɓum rì càg lɛ a toòghrɛn.

Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n yɛɛ ri, ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ bog, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkpaakpàà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Aritemis ànɛ a Efɛɛzɛ à rì mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, ɓɛ ɓiìtàkà kìɓan kìn fɔlɔɔ à kpaŋ nunùg ɓɛ̀hawò ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.

Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkanì-ɓɛ̀kaàtà à gɔmìnà à maasìghà ɓum, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Efɛɛzɛ, ghɛn yɛɛ nani lɛ ɓi bàn ì Efɛɛzɛ ìnnɛ mɛɛ mɛ coo bɛ̀ll ì giɓ inɛ lɛ Aritemis mɛ ri, rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki bɛ̀ll ìnɛn ki ki kpighày aɗyòò?
Nni yɛ̀ɛ nyoey yi yin ɓi kìɓan kiǹ, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀rii lɛ fyòoog, kɛ̀ ɓi swèɗ kiɓan kidɛŋ.
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓyàa yùu yì fɛ rì ɓɔ ɓɛ, ɓɛ komi ɓi com ɓi ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri ɓi naà-bɛ̀ll yìs i giɓ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki tòg yɔ̀ kiɓè.

Nni i Demetiriyus rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛ ri rì kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ɓɛɛ seèghkɛn ɓɛ raɗ rì ŋwaàdɛŋ, gòn yi ɓɛyɔ̀m yi ri wɔɔ, ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà girig wɔɔ, ŋwaànɛ à rì rì kìɓan ki sɔmɛn, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sɔmɛɛ!
I ɓì rì tì rì ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓì rì lɛ ɓi tɔg, ɓi ri lɛ ɓɛ pegsɛ̀n ŋwos anɛ ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà ɓɛ taŋzɛɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ.

Ɓɛ ki rì lɛ ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀n ɓìsi lɛ ti syòŋsyoŋ yi kìyoòyòò ɓi rìtaŋzɛ̀n ɗi tyàa taŋzɛɛ ɗi gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓisuulɛ, tì yin ɗi com ki tì rì lɛ ti kpaa lɛ, ti resi azi anɛ tì rì fɛ miì ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn; lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ à kpaa ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ suki.
Yɛ̀ɛ kìyoòyòò kiǹ ki lekà, Pol à taŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ à ɓaa lɛ à mɛ reɓ ɓɔ, à ghesɛ̀n min ɓɔ, à kɛ̀n a Masedwan.
A renìghà kìlànà ki zi kiǹ di a fafa ɓɛgherɛ̀n deɓ lɛɛ̀gwey, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ à kɛ̀ɛ min ki kpaŋì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Gìrɛg.
A kɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛraa, yɛ̀ɛ à mɛɛ̀ tekà fìtimà lɛ a kɛǹ a Sirii, nni à wokà lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ mɛ tɔ̀kɛn nyi, fɔɔnnɛ à tekà min nɗɛli lɛ, a sugti a Masedwan.

Ɓumɓɛ Pol à ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓɔ, ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ: Sopatɛr, ànɛ à ɓaghà man à Pirus ànɛ a Bere, rì Aristarikɛ ɓɛɛ̀ Sekunɗus ɓumɓɛ a Tesalonika, Gayus ànɛ à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ a Dɛriɓɛ, rì Timote, rì Tisig, rì Tirofim ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓumɓɛ a Azii.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ lokà kì kɛ̀ɛ asu, ɓɛ Kɛǹ ɓìsi kì ɓoŋì a Tirowas.

Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkis, ɓìsii ɓɔkà kìkom a Filiɓ di mɛ̀ru mɛ ɓɛ nkìlàg ɓìrɛsì kɛ̀ɛ̀ nwìɗ mɛ mɛ ghaàgh, fɔɔnnɛ tì kɛ̀ngà ɓɔ kì tanɛɛ a Tirowas ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛtaǹ, tì ki kɔ̀ri wɔɔ mɛru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.

Ɓi ŋwos a ǹtonto ànɛ ɓi rìtumɛ̀n ɗi sɔnɗì nnɛ tì ɓaghà ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn lɛ ti teɗ ɓìɗilàg ɓi Bɛ̀ll. Pol nyii ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì ghaghii ɓi duri tana, nni à tòkàkà rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, à ki ràɓsi ɓitòkì à kpaŋ nyìinyìm à-ru.
Ɓɛ̀lamɓà ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi kìden ki naa ki tì taŋzɛ̀ngà miì ɓi mɛɛ mɛ aɗyòò.

Nni dɛlì ì mum ìdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Etig ìnɛ ì kɔ̀kɔ̀rìghà ɓi wonɗò ì ghaghìghà rì fìlo lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ di Pol a ka ràaraɓsì lɔŋ ɓitòkì ɓii, yɛ̀ɛ fìlo fi teri nyi fɔlɔɔ, nni à kɔ̀sɛ̀ngày ɓi dɛg ì kìraa, à kpì azi; yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ pɛ̀sìghà nyi, ɓɛ ghɛn lɛ, à mɛ wu.
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à sɛngà min à kɛ̀n mɛ̀ree à pɛ̀sì dɛlì ìnɛn, à kpaa ɓum lɛ: Kɔ̀riina lɛ fyòoog, à rì cem.
Nni à sugtìghà kìɓɔɔ̀gh, à ɓɛg bìrɛs à ɗi ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìtìghà lɔŋ ri ɓìtòkì ɓii asu, duri ì ràm ì tan, fɔɔnnɛ à ki ghaghìghà min.
Ɓɛ sukà rì mutyàà dɛlì ànɛn, di à rì cem, kìɓan kiǹ ki ki lɛ, mɛ̀rem mɛɛ kpi ɓum ɓi mùm.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsii lolòkà kì kɛ̀ɛ beèbɛ̀y ɓi fìtimà fi fi kɛnkɛ̀ngà a Asɔs, wɔɔnnɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì teetii Pol, ɓisuulɛ nyii kɔnkɔ̀ngà lɛ, a kpaŋ wɔɔ ɓi zi.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à tanɛ̀ngà ɓìsi a Asɔs, tì teɗ nyi ɓi fìtimà lɛ, ti kɛǹ a Mitilɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì Pɛ̀sɛɛ wɔɔ, tì ghagsì lɔŋ rikɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗis ɓi fìtimà, tì kɛ̀n kìkpaŋì a Siyos ɓi duri tana, ŋwos anɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓkà foo, tì syaàghà a Samos, ɓi ànɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓtìtìghà nnɛ tì kpagà a Milɛ.
Pol à ɓaghà ǹsììrɛn lɛ kɛ̀ɛ rɛli a Efɛɛzɛ lɛ, cààmɛ̀n ki ri nyi ɓiì cee a Azii. À ɓòòɓòòzɛ̀ngà lɛ, a ɓa a Yorisalɛm ɓi ŋwosi Pàŋtèkot, di bee i ɓaa.
Pol à pɛ̀sìghà ɓum a Milɛ, à rom lɛ ɓɛɛ regiì nyi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kiseŋì ɓɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki a Efɛɛzɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ yughày, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yi yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛghɛɓi rì mìni cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki mɛ̀ɛ nɗì rì mìni, à tumɛ̀n lɔŋ ɓi ŋwos à ǹtonto ànɛ ǹkpagà ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Azii.
Mɛ̀ɛ nkìi Kan kìsay kɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓɔgsɛn mɛ̀ɛmiɗ nsoò lɛsàg, rì misì ɓi mɛ̀tam ɓi nyìinyìm à mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ lɛ ɓìtɔ̀kɔ̀ ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ntɔɔ̀tɔ̀kɛ̀n mɛ̀.
Ɓì yii lɛ, ǹnyamgà ɓi mini kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ki ri lɛ, ki ghɛɓsì mìni, kɛ̀ɛ ǹki risi mini rìkpaakpàà, ɗì rìrèèrèsàg ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi gwìy ì ɓum, nsoò lɛ a ɓɛ̀mɛɛ ɓin.
Ǹɗerèŋìghà lɛ, rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì Gìrɛg lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki tyweeyi Yeesus à Kan wìs.
Nni ɓigominɛ, ǹkɛ̀ɛ a Yorisalɛm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Nghay a titini mɛ lɛ nkɛǹ, ǹ-yii ɓi com ki kɛɛ̀ ɓoŋɓoŋ mɛ wɔɔ.
Kìɓan kifog, ǹ-yii lɛ ɓi bàn bimiɗ ìnɛ ǹkpaŋi wɔɔ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki ti ki resàg mɛ̀ lɛ, rì naà-zày, rì ǹkulɛ̀n ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓoŋɓoŋ mɛ wɔɔ.

Mɛ̀ m̀ɓiisɛɛ gì ɓi ki foŋì ǹto ɓi cɛɓ kɛ̀m ki mɛ̀ɛmìɗ, com ki nfɔmfɔ̀m ki ri lɛ, nkɛnkɛn asu rì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyɛm̀ yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, ǹki kì kisay ki Kan Yeesus à faghà mɛ̀, kɛɛ ri lɛ, ǹghagsi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll.
Mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ǹghaghìghà a lɔ̀ŋkin di nkakali Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, ǹ-yii lɛ syeesyee lɛ, ɓyàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi ìsu wɛ̀m à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkalii mìni gɛɛ̀nɛ lɛ: Bwaɓ yi wààdɛŋ yi yìn lɛ, yi kɛǹ mɛ̀ ɓi ǹto.
Ɓisuulɛ, ǹkpàkàkà mìni dwìɗ i Bɛ̀ll bimiɗ, kɛ̀ɛ nnyam mini nsoò maa kìɓan adɛŋ.
Fɔɔnnɛ, ɓèŋina mìniìɓɔmiɗ, ɓì ki ɓèŋ di kituu ki jɔ̀ɔ̀ yi Bɛ̀ll, yi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki rɛsìghà mìni lɛ ɓi ɓeŋ̀ɓeŋ. Mɛniina kìseŋi ki Bɛ̀ll lɛ syeesyee, lɛ à làkà kɔ rì bwaɓ yii.
Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii lɔŋ lɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ rì yɛ̀ɛ ɓìmonɗo, ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɗiŋii ɓi nyìinyìm wìn ajɛ̀m yɛ̀m, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓaa kèŋi ɓi kituu ki jɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nsoò ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ tumɛɛ gɛ rìrèrèsì ɗi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi, lɛ, ɓɛɛ syoŋ̀ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓi bee yaà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓaana cem, ɓì ki yiti lɛ, ǹɗeɓi mìni bèg yiraa, yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos kɛ̀ɛ nfɔɛy, rì misì ɓi mɛ̀tam.

Nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, ǹɗeɓsɛɛ mìni rì Bɛ̀ll ǹki reɓsɛnti mìni rì ɓɔlɛ à geesɛ̀n yìì; ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n yɛɛ ri lɛ, à kì lɛ ɓi ɓa rì ìtèɗ, à ki fati mini ɓyom ɓi à nyamgà ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛŋkii.
M̀ɓaghà ɓi ri zày ìnɛ lɛ, mum a fa mɛ̀ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nsoò gol, nsoò ɓìlàà.
Mìniìɓomiɗ ɓì yii lɛ, ǹsasàlà rì ɓyàg ɓyɛm̀ ɓi, lɛ ǹtanɛn ɓyom ɓi ti ghɛɓ miì lɛ rì mɛ̀, rì ɓumɓɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà rì ɓɔ.

Mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗèsii mìni bee yicèm lɛ, cààmɛ̀n ki ɓi sasay fɔlɔɔ, kɛɛ̀ki ɓì rì ɓiì ghɛɓsii ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɗi ìtèɗ, ɓì ki yiti jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Kan à kalìghà ɓi ŋwɔm wii lɛ: Rì ŋwaànɛ à faa, rì ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ faa com roànɛ à faa yɛɛ ti à ɓiisàg kì woògh kìrɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà ɓìtòkì ɓiǹ fɔɔnnɛ à ɓakà mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, à ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll ǹɗaŋ rì ɓɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ mum bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ à kpusɛ̀ngà rì ǹkɛ̀gh, à ki fyuŋ Pol ɓi kìmììgh lɛ a lɔɛɗ nyi.
Kìɓan ki ki ɓiisɛ̀ngà ɓɔ kì faà ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn ki ɓaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Pol à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓaa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi ìsu wii ŋwos adɛŋ. Nni ɓɛ kɛ̀ngà min nyi ki foŋì a fìtimà.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ghasɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, ɓìsii ɓɔg ɓi fìtimà tì ròŋì bee inɛ a Kos lɛ saaɗ. Ɓi duri tana tì kpaŋ a Roodɛ, yɛ̀ɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà wɔɔ, tì kɛ̀n a Patara.
Tì tanɛ̀ngà fìtimà fi fi ɓaghà ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛni a Fenisii, tì ɓɔg min miì, tì kɛ̀n.

Yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà di tì ti ɓiì seesee yì kìrìŋ ki riɓày ki lɛ Siipirɛ, tì càdkày kɔ ɓi kìmɛŋ tì nɔ̀ɔ̀tì ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a Sirii. Tì kɛ̀n kì rɛlii a Tiir, wɔɔnnɛ fìtimà fi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì sɛɛ̀dii mɛtɛ̀g.
Tì kɔrìghà wɔɔ mɛru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, lɛ tì tanɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n wɔɔ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki tinì bɛ̀gherɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ kpaà Pol lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ ɓɔg a Yorisalɛm.

Di tyàa ghagsi mɛru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, nnɛ tì rùɓtɛ̀ngà tì rì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà ɓìsi kìfɔŋì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓaa, rì ɓɔn ɓaa, ɓɛ ceesì ɓìsi ǹdèè wu bàn. Nni tì ɓakà mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, tì ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll ɓi bèn ì rìɓày.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ghesɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, ɓìsii ɓɔg ɓi fìtimà, ɓɔɔ sugtàg a ɓɛ̀mɛɛ ɓaa.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Tiir ɓi fìtimà tì yùtìghà lɔŋ ki rɛlii a Pitolemayis, tì tògsì ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ righerɛ̀n, tì ki ghagsi bimiɗ à ŋwos ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓɔ.

Ɓi duri tana nnɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà tì kɛ̀n a Sezare, wɔɔnnɛ tì kɛ̀ngà a mɛɛ mɛ Filiɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkalì-ɓɔlɛ, à ki ɓati kibog ki ɓi ɓum taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà a Yorisalɛm; a lɔ̀ŋkii nnɛ tì kɔ̀rìghà.
À ɓaghà rì ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n ɓɛnin, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka yi ɓi ɓɛbaŋì, ɓɛ ki ɓa ti ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà di tyàa ghagsi bàlì ì mɛ̀ru wɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Agaɓus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Zyude.

Yɛ̀ɛ à yughà ɓìsi kìtanɛɛ a teɗ kànɗa à Pol, à kàgì lɛ rì mɛ̀kòò mii, rì ɓyàg ɓii, à ki kpaa lɛ: Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ̀ kpaaghi lɛ: Ɓì ghɛɛ? Fɛlɛ nnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ri ɓiì kàŋi ŋwaànɛ à rì rì kànɗa ànɛ, ɓɛ ki teɗ nyi, ɓɛ fa nyi ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì wokà fɔlɔɔ, rì ɓìsi, rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ a Sezare, tì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg Pol lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ ɓɔg a Yorisalɛm.
Nni Pol à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓi ɗiighɗigsì mɛ̀ ǹɗem miì ɗì mɛ̀kɛɛ̀gh? Àa bɛn yɔ̀riyɔ̀ yɛɛ yi m̀ɓoŋɓòŋ, ǹɗì gì m̀pègsɛn lɛ nwu a Yorisalɛm ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus.
Yɛ̀ɛ à yaaghrɛ̀ngà, nni ɓìsii caɗkà nyi tì kpaa lɔŋ nyi lɛ, rìkɔ̀n ɗi Kan ɗyɛɛ kilɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɔ mɛru ɓɛ ghaghìghà, nni tì ɓùŋɛ̀ngà tì ɓɔg a Yorisalɛm.
Ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ a Sezare ɓɛ tì kɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ kɛngà ɓìsi kì foŋì yɛ̀ɛ Nazɔŋ, ŋwaànɛ a Siipirɛ, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ǹtonto, lɛ ti kɔri wɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì kpagà a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ ghaɓ ɓìsi rì kìnyàà.
Ɓi duri tana nnɛ Pol à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ Zyag. Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kiseŋi ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà girig wɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pol à tògsàkà ɓɔ, à tumɛ̀n ɓɔ rìkpaa ɗi ɓiɓan ɓìcèèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll àa ǹkii, a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓi kìsay ki nyii nkìkii.
Nni ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, ɓɛ fa Bɛ̀ll rìkem ɓɛ ki kpaa Pol lɛ: Maasoŋ̀, ù ghɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ bàlì ì ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ mɛ gherɛ̀n wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɛ ki rì lɔŋ ɓɛsììrɛn ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ ǹwoogh ɓi ɓɔlɛ, lɛ wàànɛ̀n wɔ̀ɔ̀ ti wɔ̀ɔ̀ rèsàg Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a gwèɗ lɛ, ɓɛǹ ɓɛɛ caɗ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, ɓɛn ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɗti ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓèŋdi ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓɛseŋi ɓaa.
Nni ti ghay la? Ɓaa ki rɔ̀ɓ ɓi lɛ, ɓɛ woogh ɓi lɛ ù rì fɛ.
U ki lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ tì rì wɔ̀ ɓiì kpaà lɛ u ki. Tì rì fɛ rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛnin, ɓɛ ɓɛ ǹkànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ i nàzirìyà.

Tera ɓɔ, ɓi kɛǹ a zòghɛ̀n ìnɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ, ù peè ɓìkɔ̀tɛn ɓyaa, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì kɛ̀ŋɗɛɛ mɛ̀to, i ù kìi fɔlɔɔ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ rì ɓiì ghɛɛ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wowòg ɓɛ rarɛ̀n ɗì wɔ̀ ɓɛ yin miì, rì tì lɛ wɔ̀ girig, u ɓèŋɓeŋ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, ù ki nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì ɓyɔ yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ.

Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, tì kàngà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi tì rengà lɛ, ɓɛɛ celi ɓyɛn ɓi nyàm ìnɛ ɓɛ woli ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn ɓi zɛy rì zɛy, ɓɛ celì tì bwaɓ yi nyàm ìnɛ ì wii lɛ swììɗ, rì tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g.

Nni Pol à tekà min ɓumɓɛ̀n, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kìlɛɛ zòghɛ̀n ǹɗaŋ ɓi duri tana. Fɔɔnnɛ à ɗiŋìghà min ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll rì ɓɔ, lɛ a kpaà ɓɔ gòn inɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì faà ɓìkɔ̀tɛn ɓisuu mum bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ di zòghɛ̀n ì lèegh,
Di ɓɛ ti lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔgsi mɛ̀ru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi zòghɛ̀n yàà, nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a Azii ɓɛ ghɛngà Pol ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ toosàg ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ ɓan Pol

di ɓɛɛ kuukugsɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl, yùuna ɓìsi fɛ̀! Ŋwaànɛ à ti à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ jàŋbimiɗ, di a rèresi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ ɓɛɛ ki lɛ, ɓɛ sɛɛtì kìlɔ̀ŋ kis, ɓɛ sɛɛtì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, ɓɛ ki sɛɛti naa yìs i Bɛ̀ll. Àa rɛ̀ŋii gì kì ɗiŋzii ɓumɓɛ zɛy ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll. Rìkì ɗiǹ, ɗi yogsii rìɓa ɗi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ì rì kìcèlì.
Ɓɛ kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛ lokà kìghɛɛ̀ Tirofim ànɛ a Efɛɛzɛ ɓɛɛ̀ Pol ɓi bàn, ɓɛ fekì nya lɛ Pol àa ɗiŋzii nyi ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll.
Bàn bimiɗ ì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀ngà ɓi kìɓan kiǹ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀ŋmɛ̀n yì ɓɛ̀ ɓɛg ɓɛ̀cèm, nni ɓɛ ɓangà Pol, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi ɓi dan, ɓɛ ghas kì sìmgii mɛ̀suunaa mɛ naà-Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kaakààghà bee inɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, nni ɓɔlɛ à kɛ̀ngà kì kpaŋì ɓi mɛ̀reè mɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey lɛ: Kìyoòyòò ki ti ɓi bàn ì Yorisalɛm bimiɗ.

Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàs kì terì ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛsàg, rì ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛdɛŋ à kɛ̀n mɛ̀ree ɓi jàŋ inɛ gwìy ì ɓaghà. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛngày ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey ǹɗaŋ ɗì ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ càɗ Pol, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓogti nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à tyòŋdɛ̀ngày à ɓan Pol, ɓɛ kaŋ̀ nyi bɛn ɗi mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi, à tɔg min ɓum lɛ, ŋwaàbe yɛɛ rì lɛ, cɛ kɛɛ̀ ki à kìi?

Kìɓan kifog gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n ì kìghà lɛ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ ki ri fɛlɛ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ lɛ, ki ri fɛlɛ̀. Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à ghɛngà lɛ bee inɛ lɛ a wog kìɓan miì lɛ syeesyee ì yin lɛ, kìyoòyòò ki ceeghà, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛ̀n kìlɔɔ̀gh Pol.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà rì nyi ɓi ɓɛ̀sìtɛɓ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ, ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛɛ tɛg nyi ǹtɛ̀ghɛn, ɓisuulɛ, gwìy ìnɛn ì nyɛngà lɛɛ̀gwey
lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ nɔɔnɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà nyi di ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ɓɛɛ wey nyi, ɓɛɛ wey nyi.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ ɗiŋzìghà Pol ɓi gari kɛɛ̀ki à tɔkà ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey lɛ: Ǹɗì nya lɛ m̀pɔ̀s maa jɛ̀ɛ̀? Nni roànɛ̀n à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà nyi lɛ: Ù yii kɔmiɗ rìgìrɛg?
Àa wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri kɔm̀ muu Egiɓtɛn ànɛ àa m̀ɓigtii wɛ̀y fɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ mɛ nghaghii mɛ? Nnyɛɛ nɗiŋii ɓìtɔ̀mbɔ̀ ɓi-reɓ, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin.
Nni à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ànɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ a Silisii ìnɛ lɛ Tarisi; ǹɗì ŋwaànɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ mum à yin lɛ, à còmɛ̀n, kùrùg gherɛn ɓà lɛ ǹtoòghrɛn rì ɓumɓɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey anɛ̀n à gherɛ̀ngà, Pol à rɛlìì ɓi ɓɛ̀sìtɛɓ aɗyoo, à maasì ɓum rì càg. Nni ɓum ɓɛ maarɛ̀ngà, à tòòghrɛ̀n min ɗi ɓɔ ɓi rì èbìreegh, à kpaa lɛ:
Mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓɛ̀m, ɓigomìnɛ ramina mɛ̀reè, ɓi wog com ki ǹɗì lɛ ǹɗèsì mìni.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà di Pol à toòghrɛɛ ɓi rì ebìreegh ɓɛ mam lɛ kpaɗ; nni Pol à kpaghà lɛ:

Ǹɗì muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ǹ-yalɛ̀ngà a Tarisi ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Silisii. Kìɓan kifog, fɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ nnɛ ǹtɔɔ, ǹki yilag ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓɛseŋi ɓis yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, a mɛ̀kòò mɛ Gamalyɛl; m̀ɓaghà girig ǹfalɛn ɗi Bɛ̀ll lɔŋ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mìni girig ɓì rì ɓɛ̀falɛn ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm gɛɛ̀nɛ.
Ǹɗùùɗùùsìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà bee ì Kan, wɛ̀y à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹwowòlà ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ, ǹki ɓanɓan lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ rì ɓɛ̀baŋì ǹfogì ɓɔ ɓi ɓìsɔŋ, ǹki pìki ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày.

Ǹlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ lɛ, ɓɛ faghà kɔm̀ mɛ̀ ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ a Damas. Nni ǹkɛ̀ngà wɔɔ lɛ, ǹsug yì rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ǹtanɛɛ, a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ̀kàgakɛn ɓi ɓìsɔŋ di ɓɛɛ pɔnɔ̀si ɓɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓaghà di ǹkaka ɓi bee ɓi rìkɛ̀n kì kpaŋì a Damas, nni ǹsìgmɛ̀ngà di Coo kìtɛɛtɛn ki mɛ kì yi aɗyoo lɛ ŋwààɗ, ki yu ki ceŋzɛ̀n mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkpìghà ɓi zi, ǹwog di jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ kpaakpaa mɛ lɛ: Sol! Sol wɔ̀, u yeeyeèsì mɛ̀ lɛ cɛ yɔ?
Nni m̀ɓàkà lɛ: Kan, wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri ghɛn? Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓàg mɛ̀ lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Yeesus ànɛ a Nazarɛt ànɛ ù ti, ù yeèyèèsì.
Ɓumɓɛ m̀ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓɔ, ɓɛ ghɛngà kìtɛɛtɛn, kìɓan kifog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì tòòghrɛ̀ngà rì mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛnɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹtɔkà min lɛ: Kan, cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi? Kan à ɓàg mɛ̀ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u kɛǹ a Damas, wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì rèsii com ki ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗɔ̀ɓkà kɛ̀ nghɛnɛn ti lɛ kìtɛɛtɛn kìn ki ɗiŋzìghà mɛ̀ tìɗyaŋ, nni ɓumɓɛ m̀ɓaghà rì ɓɔ ɓɛ ɓangà mɛ̀ ɓi càg, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì mɛ̀ a Damas.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ ɗii lɛ Ananyas, à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ à falɛ̀ngà ɓi rìgherɛ̀n à ki nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà a Damas, ɓɛ sɛsɛ̀kà nyi.
Nni à yùghà mɛ̀ kì ghɛɛ̀, à kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Geni wɛ̀m Sol, ghɛnɛn tì, ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ nnɛ mis mɛ̀m mɛ ghaskà kì ŋwàrɛɛ, ǹtumɛ̀n tì rìghɛnɛ̀n ǹki ghɛn nyi.
Nni Ananyas à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis à lokà wɔ̀ kì ɓɔ̀ni lɛ, u yi rìkɔ̀n ɗii, ù ghɛn m̀bobog à mum ànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ ù ki wog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì kpaŋiì ɓi ŋwɔm wìì;
ɓisuulɛ ù rì ɓiì ɓaà wusìnɛ̀ɗ wìì, lɛ u ghagsi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓìɓan ɓi ù kìghà lɛ, ù ghɛn, ù ki wog.
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, kɔ̀ɔ lɛ̀mziti, pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo u teɗ bàɓtis ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan, di ɓiɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓyɛɛ ɓa ɓìsòòyɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹsugtìghày a Yorisalɛm, nni ǹghay wɛ̀m wu faŋìghà di m̀ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔŋzàg ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll,
fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà Kan, à kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Kìya lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ, u fyaŋzi kì pɛ̀sɛɛ a Yorisalɛm lɛ ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ ɓaa gherɛn ɓi ɓiban ɓi ù rì ɓɔ ɓiì ghagsii ɓi rarɛ̀n ɗì mɛ̀.
Nni ǹkpaaghà lɛ: Kan, ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ yii lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ nkɛ̀ngì ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, di mɓanɓan yi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ wɔ̀, m̀pìpìg ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày, ǹki reereɓsì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓog ɓɔ kìtòn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wowɔlà wusìnɛ̀ɗ wɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ lɛ Ityɛn mɛɛ̀miɗ m̀ɓaghà wɔɔ, mɛ̀ m̀ɓaghà girig ɓijɛ̀m ì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ wolà nyi ɓɛ̀n, mɛ̀ yɛɛ ki ɓèŋɓèŋgà ɓìlàà ɓyaa.
Nni Kan à kpaaghà min mɛ lɛ: Kɛ̀na ɓisuulɛ, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì romi fìràɓ, ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.

Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ka kɔ̀rìghà lɛ fyòoog lɛ ɓɛɛ wog ɓìtòkì ɓii ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì siitòn inɛ̀n, nni ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìsyan jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Pisi ɓìsi ŋwaànɛ bììbiì, ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ tì ɓi lɛ a ghɛghɛɓ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ syansyàngà fɔlɔɔ di ɓɛɛ̀ màmag ɓilàà ɓyaa, ɓɛ raràɓ kùrùɓu ɓɛ pampàm aɗyòò.
Nni ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋzi Pol ɓi gari, ɓɛ ki ɓog nyi kìtòn lɛ a kpaà cɛ kɛɛ kiì lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ wog bim fɔlɔɔ ri nyi, ɓɛ syansyàn ɓi lèg ànɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ kuɓsìghà Pol lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓog nyi kìtòn, nni à tɔkà ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àsàg lɛ: Ɓì rì lɛ ɓì ɓog muu Ròmɛŋ di ɓɛ ka yɔ̀mzi ɓi nyi?
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àsàg ànɛn à wokà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n àgwey lɛ a kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù yii com ki u kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ u ki? Ŋwaànɛnii à rì muu Ròmɛŋ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey a yughà kì tɔɔ̀gh Pol lɛ: Ki ri saaɗ lɛ ù rì muu Ròmɛŋ? Pol à gherì lɛ: Ki ri saaɗ fɔ̀lɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nni ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à kpaatìghà min lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹsùùghràkà ɓyoo mɔ̀ɔ̀ni a ɓɛ̀làmì lɛ m̀ɓa ɓi nɗɛli wu muu Ròmɛŋ. Pol à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì muu Ròmɛŋ à tumɛ̀n a rìyalɛ̀n.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ ɓokà nyi kìtòn lɛ di a toòghrɛn ɓɛ ghaskà kì ghaaghraagh, nsoò ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à risìghà yɛ̀ɛ à wokà lɛ, Pol à rì muu Ròmɛŋ ɓisuulɛ, nnyɛɛ reɓsìghà lɛ ɓɛɛ kaŋ̀ nyi bɛn.

Ɓi duri tana, yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ, a konag kì yiì kìɓan ki Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀ngà Pol miì nni à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ fumi nyi bɛn, à ki tɔg ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi Sànèdìrɛŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ taŋzɛn, fɔɔnnɛ à yùghày rì Pol à rɛsì ɓɔ nyi asu.
Pol à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà mis rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi Sànèdìrɛŋ à kpaa lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, à kpaŋ gɛɛ̀nɛ, ǹɗem wu yin mɛ rì mɛ̀riighrikì nsoò lɛsàg, ɓi rìba ɗi lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey ànɛ lɛ Ananyas à reɓsìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Pol jàŋbog lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓog nyi com ɓi ŋwɔm; nni Pol à kpaaghà min nyi lɛ:

Bɛ̀ll nnyɛɛ wɔ̀ ɓiì ɓoògh, wɔ̀ com ki bàŋbàŋ ki puɓ ki! Ù kɔ̀rii foo lɛ, u yɔm̀ mɛ̀ ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna aɗyoo, kìɓan kifog kɔ̀ɔ ki nɔ̀ɔ̀ti com ki ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, ɓisuulɛ ù kpaa lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓog mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Pol jàŋbog ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Ù sɛmgii pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey à Bɛ̀ll!
Nni Pol à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, màa yii ɓi lɛ pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey yɛɛ ri, lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ, kɔ̀ɔ sɛm rifòm ɗi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ.

Yɛ̀ɛ Pol à yighà lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ri mɛ̀raŋ mɛɓɛɛ̀ lɛ, rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo ɓi nyìinyìm wàà lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, mɛ̀ ǹɗì Fàrìzyɛŋ, man à Fàrìzyɛŋ nni ɓɛɛ̀ sɔmag mɛ ɓisuulɛ, ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi lɛ ɓìloŋ ɓi ri ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ.
Pol à syɔɔ̀dìghà ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ inɛn di kìyoòyòò ki mɛ kpì ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ, rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ, fɔɔnnɛ ǹtaŋzɛn wu ghasɛ̀ngà gàɓ yiɓɛɛ̀.

Ɓisuulɛ Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ sììrag ɓi ǹdɛli wulɛ: Com kidɛŋ ki yin lɛ rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓilòŋ, nsoò lɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom, nsoò lɛ ǹghay. Wɔ̀lɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɔɔ̀ gheràg lɛ ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi ri wɔɔ.

Yɛ̀ɛ kìyoòyòò ki kɛnkɛ̀ngà lɔŋ asu rì ìtèɗ, nni ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, ɓɛ rɛli ɓi kìɓan kiǹ rì ìtèɗ, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ɓìsii ghɛɛ ɓi kiɓan ki ŋwaànɛ à kìi, ɓaà yi ɓi ǹghay wudɛŋ nsoò lɛ ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ yɛɛ ǹɗì lɛ à tòòghrɛ̀n rì nyi.

Yɛ̀ɛ kìɓan ki ɓaghà di ki mɛ ɓàŋ, ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey a risì lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì ki pàkii Pol nsoò m̀pàkakɛn fɔɔnnɛ à romgày ɓɛ̀sujàà lɛ ɓɛɛ yu nyi kì terì ɓi nyìinyìm a ɓumɓɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ pɛɛ̀zi nyi ɓi gari.
Yɛ̀ɛ ìru wu fingà, Kan à rèsɛ̀n Pol à kpaa nyi lɛ: Pol, kɔ̀ɔ càrɛn! Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ ǹlòmi kìtɛɛtɛn ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee mɛ̀ a Yorisalɛm, nnɛ ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ tì kì lòmì aà Rom.
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔrɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ kanɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ lɛ, ɓwaànɛ̀n ɓwaa ɗi ɓi com, ɓɔ kɔɔ̀ ki nɔ nsoò mɛ̀nig di ɓɔɔ ka wey ɓi Pol.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà a dwìɗ i m̀ɓeɓɛn inɛ̀n ɓɛ ceeghà mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀.
Nni ɓɛ kɛngà kì tanɛɛ lɛ, rì ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛ kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Tyàa kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ri ɓìsiì ɓɔmiɗ lɛ tì yin lɛ tì ɗi com di tì ka wey ɓi Pol.

Nni ɓigomìnɛ, rì mìni rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi Sànèdìrɛŋ, tɔɔghna ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey lɛ a yuiy mìni rì Pol, ɓi pwaà lɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ, ɓi konag kì fiɓii kiɓan kii lɛ syeesyee. Ɓi ɓɛg wìs, tì ti ɓɛ̀pègsɛn lɛ ti wey nyi di à ka kpaŋ ɓi a lɔ̀ŋkin.
Yɛ̀ɛ mancɛɛ Pol àdɛŋ à wokà dwìɗ inɛ̀n, nni à kɛ̀ngà jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ lɔkà Pol, à wogsì nyi yɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à reŋìghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɛ̀na kì foŋì dɛlì ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey lɛ, à rì rì kìɓan ki lɛ a kpaà nyi.

Nni ǹkɔmɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà ànɛn à tekà dɛlì ìnɛn, à kɛ̀n ɗì yɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n àgwey à kalì nyi lɛ: Kìmbùŋ ki lɛ Pol, kɛ yaa regii mɛ̀, ki kpaa lɛ ǹ-yuy rì dɛlì ìnɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, ɓisuulɛ ì rì rì kìɓan kidɛŋ ki yɛ̀ɛ kpaà wɔ̀.
Nni ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à ɓangà ŋwɔɓti ànɛ̀n ɓi càg, ɓɛ kɛǹ dwìɗ, à tɔg nyi lɛ: Kìɓan aɗi kɛɛ̀ki u kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ù kpaà mɛ̀?

Dɛlì ìnɛn ì ɓàg lɛ: Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ mɛ wooghrɛn jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ yu wɔ̀ kì tɔɔ̀gh lɛ ù kɛǹ ɗì Pol a Sànèdìrɛŋ rìduri, ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɓanɛɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ lɛ, ɓɔɔ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓɔɔ konag tì kì fiɓii kiɓan ki anɛ̀n.

Nni kɔ̀ɔ wog com ki ɓɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì kpaà ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛ ceeyɛn mɛtin mɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ ri nyi ɓɛ̀ ranɗamɛn ɓi bee, ɓum ɓɛncèm ɓɛ ǹkànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ lɛ, ɓɔɔ yin lɛ ɓɛ ɗi com, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki nɔ nsoò mɛ̀nig di ɓɔɔ ka wey ɓi Pol. Ɓigomìnɛ, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀pègsɛn nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛnɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓoŋɓòŋ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à càɗkà ŋwɔɓti ànɛ̀n lɛ a kɛǹ. À ki siitɛn nyi lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kpaa mum lɛ, àa yùu nyi kì kpàkii dwìɗ inɛ̀n.

Nni ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛsàg ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Terina ɓɛ̀sujàà lɛ: ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ ɓi zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ aɗyoo mɛ̀tin mɛraa rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ mɛkɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; ɓi pegsɛn lɛ, ɓì rì ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ mɛkɛ̀ɛ̀ taànìn à rììru, ɓi rìkɛ̀n ɗi a Sezare.
Ɓùŋɛɛna girig zòm i kìmbɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓisuu Pol, lɛ ɓi kɛǹ ɗì nyi yɛ̀ɛ gɔmìnà Felis lɛ soghàsogha.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kàngà min kaàtà lɛ:
Mɛ̀ Kiloodɛ Lizyas, ǹtogsii wɔ̀ Felis gɔmìnà àgwey.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ mɓani ŋwaànɛ ǹɗomiì wɔ̀ ànɛ, ɓɛ ǹki ti lɛ ɓɛɛ wes̀ nyi, nni mɛ̀ɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ rì ɓɛ̀sujàà, m̀ɓàtɛ̀n nyi ɓi ɓyàg ɓyaa, di m̀mɛ wog lɛ, à rì muu Ròmɛŋ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì rì zày ìnɛ lɛ, di màa yii kìɓan ki àa nkìi ɓɔ, nni mɛ̀ɛ ǹgherɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ yɔmzi nyi ɓi ǹtaŋ̀zɛn waa wulɛ Sànèdìrɛŋ.
Ɓi ɓɛg wɛ̀m, mɛ̀ nghɛɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ̀ sɔmag nyi ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi seesee ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyaa. Kìɓan kifog, à kìi ɓi bimiɗ à kìɓan anɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ wey nyi miì, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ pig nyi ɓi naà-zày.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓaa kɔ̀ŋɗɛɛ mɛ̀ lɛ, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ mɛ tɔ̀kɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, fɔɔnnɛ màa ghàsi wɔ̀ nyi kì romìì, ǹki kpaa ɓum ɓii ɓɛ kiɓan lɛ, ɓɛɛ yu nyi kì sɔmɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ ɓɔmìɗ. Òo òò yaà.
Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ kighà lɔŋ ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki. Ɓɛ teɗ Pol, ɓɛ kɛǹ lɔŋ ɗi nyi rì ìru wìn, ɓɛ kpaŋ a Aŋtipatiris.
Ɓi duri tana, ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi zi ɓɛ caɗkà ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓi zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghaàgh rì nyi beèbɛ̀y, ɓɔɔ sugtìì rì jɛ̀m ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ka lɔkà Pol.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ ɓi zòm yi kìmbɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓɛ kpagà a Sezare, ɓɛ fa gɔmìnà kaàtà, ɓɛ ceesì Pol ɗì nyi.
Nni gɔmìnà à ɓàlà kaàtà ànɛn à tɔg min Pol lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì ŋwaànɛ ɓi tum a zi abe? Ɓɛ resì nyi lɛ, ŋwaànɛ a Silisii yɛɛri.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà min nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ m̀ɓiì yiì kìɓan kɔɔ di ɓum ɓɔɔ ɓɛ sɔmìnà ɓɛ mɛ kpaŋ fɛ. À reɓsì min ɓum lɛ, ɓɛɛ ka kɛ̀n ki lɔɔ̀gh Pol ɓi mɛɛ mɛ Eroodɛ.
Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛtaǹ, nni pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey ànɛ lɛ Ananyas à sɛngày a Sezare, ǹɗaŋ rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ, rì loyà àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Tɛrityul. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀ngà Pol rì gɔmìnà.
Nni ɓɛ reŋìghày Pol, Tɛrityul à tumɛ̀n rìkpaa ɗi kiɓan ǹŋwèe lɛ:

Gɔmìnà àgwey, coo syeesyee wɔ̀ɔ̀ a rìkɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì, rì nyɔɔnyɔn à rìwòŋzì ɗi ɓiɓan anɛ ù mɛ wòŋzì ɓi kìrɔɔ ki kilɔ̀ŋ kis, ɓi mɛ kì lɛ, ti ɓa rì fyòoog, tì ki nyàanyaàrɛ̀n rì ɓɛ̀syeesyee ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛǹ ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, jàŋbimiɗ, tì ki fafa ti wɔ̀ ɓìtògsɛ̀n.
Ɓi ɗi lɛ tyɛ̀ ki ɓiisɛn wɔ kìyeesii, m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzii wɔ̀ lɛ, u ram̀ mɛ̀reè, u wog kìɓan ki nkìki lɛ ǹɗesi wɔ̀ kìden lɛ cɔs.
Tìi ǹghɛɛ lɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì fìɓàg, a ɓiighɓigtì kìyoòyòò ɓi nyìinyìm à Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓi Zi bimiɗ. Nnyɛɛ ki rìtì rìfòm ɗi righerɛ̀n ɗi nyɔn ɗi ɓumɓɛ a Nazarɛt.
Àa mɛɛ̀ kì gi lɛ, a yogsi rìɓa ɗi naà-Bɛ̀ll yìs, ɗi ì rì kìcèlì nni tìi mɓani nyi, tì fèg lɛ ti yɔmzi nyi ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis.
Kìɓan kifog, ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey ànɛ lɛ Lizyas, àa n-yùu yì rì coo kigùg, à ɓàtɛ̀n nyi ɓi ɓyàg ɓis,
à ki kpaa lɛ, ɓumɓɛ anɛ̀n ɓɛ kiɓan, ɓɛn ɓɛɛ yuiy fɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ; yɛ̀ɛ ù rì nyi ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh mɛ̀tɔɔ́ghtɔɔgh, nnɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ ù rì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ saaɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi tì sɔmɛɛ nyi ɓi miì.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛm̀dɛ̀ngà rìkpaa ɗi Tɛrityul ɗiǹ, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kiǹ ki nɗì.

Nni gɔmìnà à reɓsìghà Pol rì càg lɛ, ànɛ̀n a toòghrɛn, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà min lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii lɛ ki mɛ finɛn bàlì yi bèg, yɛ̀ɛ waà yɔ̀myɔ̀m ɓìɓan fɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kis, fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi ɓi nɗem ɓi kìɓan kɛm̀ yɛ̀ɛ ǹti ɓiì kpaasɛɛ lɛ.
Ù rì lɛ ù tɔg rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ǹkòo ki mɛ cee mɛru ntɛ̀ɗ rì mɛɓɛɛ̀, yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ mɓɔɔgh a Yorisalɛm lɛ mɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ nsoò ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, nsoò ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nsoò ɓi bàn, ŋwaàdɛŋ à tanɛɛ ɓi mɛ di ǹnyoonyolɛ̀n rì ɓum, nsoò;
ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ, ɓɛ yin ɗi kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ɓaàzì sɔmìnà wàà miì yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ rɛrɛlii lɔ̀ɔ̀.

Kìɓan ki mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ki ri lɛ, nkìki Bɛ̀ll à ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis kisay ɓi bee inɛ ɓɔɔ̀ rereŋi lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi nyɔ̀n. Ǹgherɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri ɓi kaàtà à ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis, rì ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ kangà;
ǹɗi rì dyàɓɛn yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, nsoò ɓɔ girig, lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ saaɗ, nsoò ɓɛ ɓɛ yin lɛ saaɗ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ ŋwosi righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓilòŋ.
Kìɓan kin kɛɛ̀ki mɛ̀ girig ntèeteèsì nyoo ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm lɛ, ǹɗem wɛ̀m wɛɛ ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓi mis mɛ ɓum.
Di ki mɛ finɛn bèg lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ ǹghaghìghà, nnɛ mɛ̀ɛ n-yùu rì ɓyom lɛ nkaɓsag rì ɓumɓɛ nyìighnyìg ɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɛm̀, ǹki fùnɛn ɓituwe ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll.
Nni fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ntanɛɛ mɛ̀ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll di ǹti ɓiì lègsii zòghɛ̀n yɛ̀m, nsoò cììba ki ɓum, nsoò kìyoòyòò, com ɗì com ki n-yìn.
Kìɓan kifog, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ a Azii ɓɔ yɛɛ nghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ mɛ̀ kì yùu ki sɔmɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, di ɓɛ nki rì lɛ, ɓɛ ɓa rì kìɓan ki ɓɛɛ cɔɓɛn ɓɛ raɗ ɗì mɛ̀.
I ki yin fɔlɔɔ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ kali min kiɓan kiɓeɓtɛn ki ɓɛ nghɛɛ lɛ ǹkìi ŋwos anɛ ɓɛ n-yɔ̀mzii mɛ̀ ɓi Sànèdìrɛŋ.
I ki cee ɓi lɛ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nkalii ɓi nyìinyìm wàà lɛ: M̀mɛ rɛli ɓɛyɔ̀m gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓi mis min lɛ, kìɓan ki righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ wa?
Fɔɔnnɛ Felis ànɛ à konàkà kì yiì kìɓan ki ɓi dɔgtɛ̀n ìnɛn, à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà kìɓan rijɛ̀m à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì yɔ̀mi kiɓan kin di ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà àgwey ànɛ lɛ Lizyas à mɛ kpaŋ fɛ.
Nni à reɓsìghà ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sùjàà àsàg lɛ, a pɛɛ̀zi Pol ɓi naà-zày, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓiisɛn nyi kìɓèŋɓeŋi, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ ki règ ɓum ɓii lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀ɓsì nyi.

Yɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɔɔ mɛru ɓɛ ghaghìghà, Felis à yùy ɓɛɛ̀ giy anɛ lɛ Durusil, ànɛ à ɓaghà gɔ̀n ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, nni à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ regiì nyi Pol. Nni Pol à kpaaghà nyi kìɓan ki ki seesee ǹtyweeyi wu ɓi Kiris Yeesus.

Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìtòkì ɓi ɓaghà di ɓyaa kɛ̀n ki kòmi saaɗ ànɛ a kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll, rì rìɓan ɗi ǹɗem ɗi lɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ kì ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn, rì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à ri ren ɓum ɓìɓan, nni Felis à risìghà, à kpaa lɛ: Ɓigomìnɛ ù rì lɛ, ù ka sugtì, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì regii ti di ǹghɛɛ kìrɔŋiɗ.
À mììmìngàkà tìtyɛɛ̀ lɛ Pol à rì nyi ɓiì faà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni. Fɔɔnnɛ à kìkìghà lɛ, rì ŋwos rì ŋwos à reŋì nyi lɛ ɓɛɛ tokì.
Yɛ̀ɛ bèg yi ghaghìghà yiɓɛɛ̀, nni ɓɛ romgày gɔmìnà àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Pɔrisyus-Fɛstus ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu Felis. Yɛ̀ɛ Felis à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ a puɓsi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ǹɗem, nni à càɗkà Pol ɓi naà-zày.
Wɔ̀lɛ ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛraa ànɛ gɔmìnà ànɛ lɛ Fɛstus à kpagà ɓi kìden ki zi ki à kɔ̀mɛ̀ngà, à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Sezare, à ɓɔg a Yorisalɛm.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓìtèetèd ɓi ɓum ɓi a Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛ yughà nyi kìghɛɛ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ sɔmɛn Pol.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàkà Fɛstus lɛ, i à rì lɛ à gherɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ yuiy rì Pol a Yorisalɛm, lɛ ɓɔɔ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ tɔ̀kɛn lɛ, ɓɛ ri nyi ɓiì ɓoŋì ɓi bee lɛ ɓɛɛ wey.
Wɔ̀lɛ Fɛstus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà ɓɔ lɛ Pol à rì ǹlɔlɔghɛn a Sezare, rì tì lɛ, nyimiɗ a ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sugtii wɔɔ lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ.
Nni à ɓɔ̀ɓkà jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: I ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi mìni ɓɛ ri rì bee, ɓɛɛ nɔɔ̀tiì mɛ̀, di ti sɛǹ a Sezare ǹɗaŋ, lɛ i ŋwaànɛ̀n à rì rì kìɓan kiɓeɓtɛn ki àa nkìi, ɓɛɛ sɔmɛn nyi.
Fɛstus à ghagsìghà ɓi mɛru mɛ ceeyɛn taàraa nsoò lɛ ǹtɛ̀ɗ a lɔ̀ŋkaa, fɔɔnnɛ à sugtìghà a Sezare. Ɓi ɗuri tana nnɛ à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi kìkpanà ki ɓɛyɔ̀m, à rom lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ yì Pol.

Yɛ̀ɛ Pol à yùghày, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ kɔmzɛ̀ngà nyi, ɓɛ kpaa ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ raràɗ ɗi nyi, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ kpaakpààghà ɓìɓan ɓìn rì ŋwɔm kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki ki resii lɛ ɓi ri saaɗ.
Pol à yɔ̀myɔ̀mgà lɛ: Ǹsɛ̀rii ɓi kiɓan kidɛŋ ki rarɛ̀n ɗì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n nsoò lɛ rì naà-Bɛ̀ll, nsoò rì Kaaza.
Yɛ̀ɛ Fɛstus à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ a puɓsi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n mɛ̀rem nni à tɔkà Pol lɛ: Ù rì lɛ, ù gherɛ̀n lɛ, ù kɛǹ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛɛ yɔm̀ kìɓan kɔɔ wɔɔ di mɛ̀ ǹɗì ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn?
Nni Pol à ɓàkà lɛ: Ǹɗɛrɛlii ɓi ɗi lɛ, nkpaŋ ɓi kìkpanà ki ɓɛyɔ̀m ki Kaaza, wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛɛ reǹ kìɓan kɛm̀; ǹkìi ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n nsoò maa kìɓan adɛŋ à m̀ɓeɓtɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ ù yii.

Nkòo ki rì lɛ ǹɗì rì zɛ̀ɗ, nsoò lɛ i mɛ̀ɛ ǹkìi kìɓan ki lɛ ɓɛɛ wey mɛ̀ miì, màa ɓèn ɓi riwù, kìɓan kifog i ki ghɛnɛɛ lɛ saaɗ à yin ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ sɔmɛɛ mɛ̀ miì nsoò lɛsàg, mum à yin ri ìtèɗ wulɛ, à teɗ mɛ̀ à fa rì ɓɔ; ǹghagsii kìɓan kɛm̀ yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza.
Yɛ̀ɛ Fɛstus à tɔkà ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ nɗeɓkì nyi, nni à ɓàkà min Pol lɛ: Yɛ̀ɛ ù ghagsii kìɓan kɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza, ù rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ a lɔ̀ŋkii.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɔ mɛru ɓɛ ghaghìghà, nni rìfòm ɗi lɛ Agiripa ɓɛɛ Berenis, ɓɛ yughày a Sezare lɛ ɓɛɛ togsi Fɛstus.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìghagsii gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru wɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ Fɛstus à rèsìghà rìfòm kìɓan ki Pol à kpaa lɛ: Felis, àa ncàri ŋwaàdɛŋ fɛ ɓi naà-zày.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗìì a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ n-yùu nyi kìsɔmɛɛ, ɓɛ ki kpaa mɛ lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ nfa ànɛ̀n rìnàn.

Nni mɛ̀ɛ mɓàagh ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ ɓɛ yin ɗi kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ki lɛ, i ɓɛ sɔmɛɛ mum ɓɛ gherɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ wes̀ ŋwaànɛ̀n, di à ka rɛɛsɛn ɓi ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ sɔmɛɛ nyi, ɓɛ càɗ nyi cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ a kpaàsɛn ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ kpaakpaa ɓɛ raràɗ ɗì nyi.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ n-yùu yì fɛ, mɛ̀ mɓoŋi ɓi lɛ cààmɛ̀n kɛɛ ghaàgh, mɛ̀ɛ nkɔ̀rii ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓi duri tana, ǹki rom lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ yì ŋwaàncèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ nɗɛlii ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m, ɓum ɓɛ kiɓan ɓɛ ǹkpaa ɓi nsoò kìɓan kifog ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi mɛ̀ɛ ǹfèfeegh lɛ, à ɓaghà lɛ à kì.
Paàzì wàà àa nɗì ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee rìgherɛ̀n ɗyaa, à ɓiìɓììsɛ̀n ɓi kìɓan ki ŋwaàdɛŋ lɛ Yeesus, ànɛ à wughà, wɔ̀lɛ Pol nyii kalàg lɛ, ànɛn à rì cem.
Ɓi ɓɛg wɛ̀m, com ki mɛ̀ɛ nɗi lɛ ǹkpaa ɓi kìɓan kiǹ ki ǹ-yeesii mɛ̀. Fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ɛ m̀mɛɛ̀ kpaa nyi lɛ, i à kɔ̀ni a kɛǹ a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛɛ yɔm̀ kìɓan kii wɔɔ.
Wɔ̀lɛ Pol àa ntɔɔgh lɛ kìɓan kii kɛɛ ghaàgh yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza. Fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nkalii lɛ, ɓɛɛ ka ɓèŋ nyi ɓi naà-zày à kpaŋ ŋwos anɛ ǹɗì nyi ɓiì romì yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza.
Nni Agiripa à kpaaghà Fɛstus lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ nwog ǹkpaà wu ŋwaànɛ̀n. Fɛstus à ɓàg nyi lɛ, ù rì ɓiì woògh rìduri.

Yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà Agiripa ɓɛɛ̀ Berenis ɓɛ yughày ri coo rìgwey ɓɛ ɗiŋì ɓi naà-ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m, ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛgwey, rì ɓɛ̀lem ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓi bàn ɓɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghày ɓɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ Fɛstus à romgà min lɛ ɓɛɛ yuis̀ rì Pol.

Nni Fɛstus à kpaaghà lɛ: Rìfòm Agiripa rì mìniìcèm ɓɛ ɓì rì fɛ rì ɓìsi, ǹwaànɛ ɓi seesee anɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yughà mɛ̀ kìghɛɛ̀ lɛ rì a Yorisalɛm rì fɛfɛ bisu wii, ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀g mɛ̀ jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ, ɓɛɛ wey nyi.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi mɛ̀, mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ ɓi kiɓan kiɓeɓtɛn ki à kìi ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ wey nyi miì, nni yɛ̀ɛ nyimiɗ yɛɛ ntɔɔgh lɛ kìɓan kii kɛɛ ghaàgh yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza, nni mɛ̀ɛ nkpaa lɛ, ǹɗi nyi ɓiì romì wɔɔ.

Wɔ̀lɛ ǹka yin ɗi bimiɗ à kìɓan anɛ ǹɗì lɛ ǹkàn Kaaza ɓi kìɓan ki ǹwaànɛ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ǹɗɛsii nyi fɛ ɓi mis min, a ɓiisɛ̀n ɓi mis mɔɔ, wɔ̀ rìfòm Agiripa lɛ i tyàa mɔ̀ɔmɔmgì kìɓan kii, fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yi cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ǹɗì lɛ ǹkàn Kaaza;
lɛ ki ri ɓiì ɓaà kìdìmìdimi ki kiɓan, di ǹɗomi kìmbùŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza kɛ̀ɛ ǹɗèsi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ki nsɛ̀raagh lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n.
Nni Agiripa à kpaaghà Pol lɛ: Tì faa wɔ̀ ìtèɗ wulɛ, u kpaàsɛn. Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à nàmgà càg, à tumɛ̀n mɛ̀kpaà lɛ:
Rìfòm Agiripa, ǹɗì rì kìnyàà lɛ nɗɛli gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓi mis mɔɔ, lɛ n-yɔm̀ ɓìɓan ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ti ɓɛ sɔɔ̀sɔ̀mɛ̀n mɛ̀ miì
ɓisuulɛ, ù yii ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓìcèm lɛ syeesyee, rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ti ɓi syogàg yì nyoey ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, fɔɔnnɛ m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh wɔ̀ lɛ, u maàsi ǹɗem, u woòg kìtòkì kɛm̀.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yii cɛɓ kɛ̀m, à tumɛ̀n di ǹkaka maa ŋwɔɓti, yɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛghɛɓi a Yorisalɛm ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɛm̀.
Ɓɛ yii mɛ̀ fìɗyàɓ, ɓaa ki rì lɛ, ɓɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛm di ɓɛ kɔnì, lɛ ǹghɛghɛ̀ɓkà yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ cìɓtaagh rìɓèŋ ɗi ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗis.
I ǹki rɛrɛlii gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓi ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m, ki ri ɓisuu ntyweeyi wu ɓi ǹkàg wu Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis.

Nkàg wiǹ wɛɛ̀wu mɛ̀kuu mis mɛcèm ntɛ̀ɗ ɗì mɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn mɛ mɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll lɛ rì ìru rì ŋwos kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìfɔɛy, mɛ tyweetywèèyì lɛ wu ri ɓiì roni rìfòm, ɓisuu ntyweeyi wiǹ innɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ sɔmag mɛ.
Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ mìniì teki nyoey lɛ Bɛ̀ll à yin lɛ à ghèmzì ɓìloŋ?
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ ǹfèfèkà lɛ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ nɗuù rì ɗii ɗi Yeesus ànɛ a Nazarɛt bee yicèm.

Kìsay kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkìghà a Yorisalɛm lɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ m̀pìkà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi naà-zày rì ìtèɗ wu ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ faghà mɛ̀. Mɛ̀ɛ nki ti m̀ɓɛmdàg fèg wàà di ki kpaŋi lɛ ɓɛɛ wey ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n.

Mɛ̀ɛ nti m̀pɔnɔsàg ɓɔ ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yìcèm, ǹkàŋkaŋ ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ càɗ rìgherɛ̀n ɗyaa; bim yɛm̀ ìnɛ rì ɓɔ ì tèghɛ̀ngà lèg ànɛ lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ nti ǹkɛ̀ngàg ɓɔ ki ɓangii nsoò ɓi bàn yi tiràɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɛ̀ngà ŋwos adɛŋ a Damas, di ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛɛ romi mɛ̀, ɓɛ fa mɛ̀ kaàtà lɛ, ɓɔɔ faa mɛ̀ ìtèɗ wulɛ nkɛǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà di toroɓ à tiì rìfòm, fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà di coo kitɛɛtɛn ki kii yì aɗyoo lɛ ŋwààɗ, ki yuis̀, ki ceŋzɛ̀n lɛ rì mɛ̀, rì ɓumɓɛ tì ɓaghà rì ɓɔ.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm tì kpìlàkà ɓi zi, ǹwog min di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ kakali mɛ ɓi rì èbìreegh lɛ: Sol wɔ̀ sol wɔ̀, ù yeeyeèsì mɛ̀ lɛ cɛ? Ki rì wɔ̀ ɓiì ɓaà ǹtɔɓ lɛ u kɛnkɛn asu, ù yaàghyààghrɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Sanìnya ànɛ à risii ɓi nkpas wu m̀ɓèŋì wìì.
Nni ǹtɔkà nyi lɛ: Kan, wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri ghɛn? Kan à ɓàg mɛ̀ lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Yeesus ànɛ u yeeyeèsì.

Kìɓan kifog, pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u rɛli mɛ̀rɛy lɛ kìɓan ki ǹɗèsɛɛ wɔ̀ miì ki ri lɛ, nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ u ɓa ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀, ù ki ɓa wusìnɛ̀ɗ wɛ̀m lɛ u kakali ɓum yɛ̀ɛ wàa ghɛɛ mɛ̀ gɛɛ̀nɛ, ù rì ɓiì ki kakalii ti ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì rèsii ti.
Ǹɗì ɓiì kàmɛɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓizɛy ɓi ǹɗomi wɔ̀ wɔɔ, lɛ u ŋwàɗ ɓyɔ mis,

di ɓyɛɛ pɛsɛn yì ɓi birìm, ɓyɛɛ yu ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn, ɓi leg yì ɓi rìlàmì ɗi Satàn, ɓi yuiy yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì kìi lɛ, i ɓɛ mɛ gherɛn mɛ, Bɛ̀ll à cenɛ̀n ɓɔ ɓìbe ɓyaa, à ki fa ɓɔ ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu ɓum ɓii.
Rìfòm Agiripa, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ǹkìghà ɓi ɓɛ̀lɔg ɓi kìɓan ki ki resɛ̀ngày mɛ̀ kiǹ aɗyòò.

Wɔ̀lɛ ǹka lokà kìkalii ɓumɓɛ a Damas ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, ǹkalì girig ɓumɓɛ a Yorisalɛm rì ɓɛ ɓi zi ì Zyude bimiɗ, à kpagì lɛ rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓizɛy miì; ǹkpaakpààghà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛɛ gherɛn Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ki kì ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ resi lɛ, cɛɓ kaa ki ti kìlɔ̀gtɛn.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ mɓani mɛ̀ miì ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ kɔǹ lɛ di ɓaa woli mɛ̀.

Wɔ̀lɛ, rìɓèŋ ɗi Bɛ̀ll a ɓèŋɓeŋ mɛ, ɗyɛɛ kiì lɛ, m̀ɓaɓa ɓi cɛɓ à kpaŋ gɛɛ̀nɛ, fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ a kakali lɛ, rì ɓɔɓti, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, ɓiɓan ɓii, kɛ̀ɛ ǹki sagti kiɓan kidɛŋ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan rì Moyis ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ, ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ,
ɓyɛɛ ri lɛ: Kiris à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìwiì, à ki ɓa ŋwaà ǹtonto ànɛ a ghemɓɛn yì a ɓìloŋ, à lòm kìtɛɛtɛn ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kis rì ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓimbog lɛ ɓyɛɛ yi lɛ ɓi ri ɓiì ɓaà rì cɛɓ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pol à kpaàkpààsɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ, nni Fɛstus à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Pol, ù rì kìyèg, coo riyi ɗyɔɔ ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi ghaasii wɔ̀ kìyèg.
Pol à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Coo gìn i mum Fɛstus, ǹ-yin kiyèg, ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpàà ɓi ri ɓìɓan ɓi saaɗ, ɓi ki wooghrɛn,
Rìfòm ɗi yii ɓìɓan ɓi fɔɔnnɛ nkakali nyi ɓyɔ lɛ fwàafwàày lɛ ǹkonaagh kì yiì lɛ à còmɛɛ ɓi kiɓan miì nsoò kìfog, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi kilɛ̀ngà a rìnyam.
Rìfòm Agiripa, ù gherɛɛ nya ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ kpaaghà? Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii lɛ, ù ghɛrɛɛ ɓyɔ̀.
Nni Agiripa à kpaaghà Pol lɛ: Ki rɔɓi lɛsàg lɛ, u ki lɛ m̀ɓa kìristɛ̀n.

Pol à ɓàg lɛ: Nsoò ki kilɛɛ ɓi fɔlɔɔ ɓigomìnɛ, rìkɔ̀n ɗyɛm̀ ɗi ri lɛ, nsoò gɛ fin, Bɛ̀ll a gherɛn lɛ rì wɔ̀, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wowog ɓitòkì ɓyɛm̀ gɛɛ̀nɛ, ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀, kìɓan kifog kɛ̀ ɓi ɓa ri ɓɛn yi mɛ̀ ǹɗì yi rì yɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ rìfòm, rì gɔmìnà, rì Berenis, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà aɗyoo,
ɓɛ kɛǹ dwìɗ ɓɛ kpaakpàà wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à kìi ɓi kiɓan ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ wey nyi miì, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ foŋ nyi ɓi naà-zày.
Nni Agiripa à kpaaghà Fɛstus lɛ, i kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa lɛ ŋwaànɛ à tɔkà lɛ kìɓan kii kɛɛ kɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza, di ɓɛ cari nyi.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ rengà lɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɛ̀ɛ a Italii ɓi fìtimà, nni ɓɛ tekà lɛ rì Pol, rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ fa ɓɔ rì ǹkɔmɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà àsàg ànɛ ɓi kìtuu ki ɓɛsujàà ki ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ, ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ Kaaza ànɛ a Italii ɗii lɛ: Zyulyus.

Nni tì ɓɔkà fìtimà fi a Adiramit, lɛ fyɔ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìsòrii bèn ì rìɓày ìnɛ a Azii, fɔɔnnɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà rì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀, tì ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ ɗi Aristarikɛ, ŋwaànɛ a Tesalonika, ɓi kìden ki zi ki a Masedwan.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì rɛlìghà a Sidɔŋ ɓi duri tana fɔɔnnɛ Zyulyus ànɛ à ɓeŋɓèŋgà Pol rì syeesyee à ǹɗem, à gherɛ̀ngà lɛ Pol a kɛǹ ki ghɛɛ̀ mɛ̀ghan mii, mɛɛ fa nyi ɓyom ɓi ɓi kaàkààrɛ̀ngà nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo, nni tì narighà bèn ì rìɓày ìnɛ a Siipirɛ, ɓisuulɛ, bɛ̀ɓ ì ɓaghày ɓìsi asu, ì fɛɛ̀fɛ̀ɓsìì ɓìsi ɓi nyòò.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì syààghà rìɓày ànɛ à rì jàŋbog rì jàŋ yi lɛ Silisii, rì Paŋfilii, nni tì kɛ̀ngà kìrɛlii a Mira ànɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ lɛ Lisii.
Wɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à ghɛngà fìtimà fidɛŋ fi a Alɛgsaŋdirii, fi fi kɛnkɛ̀ngà a Italii, à ɓɔgsì ɓìsi miì.

Fìtimà fi kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà lɛ tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, fɔɔnnɛ tì ghagsìghà mɛ̀ru lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi bee, tì ki kɛ̀n ki kpaŋì jàŋbog rì Kiniidɛ di tyàa ghɛn ntɔɓ. Yɛ̀ɛ bɛ̀ɓ ì faghà ɓi ɓisi bee inɛ lɛ ti kɛnkɛn beèbɛ̀y ɓi san ànɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ tì sòrìghà kìriŋ ki rìɓày ki lɛ Kirɛɗɛ, ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a Salmone.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà lɔŋ asu rì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ nni tì kpagà ɓi jàŋ idɛŋ ɗii lɛ: Bopɔɔr, di tyàa ghɛn ntɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey; jàŋ incèm ì ɓaghà jàŋbog rì bàn ìnɛ lɛ Lasee.
Gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru ì ɓaghà di ì mɛ ghaàgh, fɔɔnnɛ ki ɓaghà di ki ti koŋnyòò lɛ mum a kɛɛ̀kɛɛ tì ɓi fìtimà, ɓisuulɛ ŋ̀wos ànɛ ɓɛ ncèlàg ɓìɗilàg à ɓaghà di à mɛ ghaàgh.

Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Pol à rɔ̀ɔ̀rɔ̀gsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ à kpaakpàà lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ lɛ, rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi ɗyaa syɔn ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan; ɓisuulɛ, fìtimà rì mɛ̀tɛ̀g mɛ mɛ ri miì, ɓi ɓiì ɗyàŋì, nsoò ɓìsiìɓɔmiɗ, tì rì ɓi koŋnyòò.
Kìɓan kifog, ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à ɓiisɛ̀ngà kì tyweeyii rikpaa ɗi ɓumɓɛ lɛ, rì ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-fìtimà, rì m̀pusì-fìtimà, à cee ɓìɓan ɓi Pol à kpaaghà.

Yɛ̀ɛ jàŋ inɛ̀n ì ɓiisɛ̀ngà ɓi ki rɔɔtɛɛ lɛ ŋwaa ghagsi cààmɛ̀n à bùmà wɔɔ, nni kìgwey ki ɓum ki ɓi ɓɔ, ki gherɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ ruɓtɛn tì ɗì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀, lɛ i bee i ɓaa, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Fenis, ɓi jàŋ idɛŋ ìnɛ a Kirɛɗɛ, ìnɛ tìtimà tyɛɛ̀ rɛlag wɔɔ, ìnɛ ì faa mis ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ ŋwos a kɛ̀ngi ki nɔ̀ŋii, lɛ ɓɛ kɔnkɔ̀ngà lɛ bɛɛ ghagsi cààmɛ̀n à bùmà wɔɔ.

Yɛ̀ɛ maa fɛ̀ɛ̀fɛ̀ɛ̀ à kìkìghày fɛlɛ duŋzi, ɓɛ fekì nya lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì kpaŋzɛɛ fèg wàà anɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Fenis. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ lɔmzìghày min fitimà, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìsòsòrì ɗi kirìŋ ki riɓày ki lɛ Kirɛɗɛ.
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ maa cààmɛ̀n à mɛɛ̀ ghaghìghà ɓɛ sigmɛ̀n di coo bɛ̀ɓ ìnɛ ɓɛɛ regi lɛ Rakilon ki mɛ pɛ̀sɛn yi ǹkòkwey ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày.

Bɛ̀ɓ ìnɛn ì tumɛ̀n rìtyɔg ɗi fitimà, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bee inɛ lɛ fyɛɛ nɔɔnɔ̀ɔ̀tì tì bèn ì kìrìŋ ki rìɓày, fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsii càrɛ̀ngà lɛ fìtimà fyɛɛ ɓɛnɓɛn rì ɓìsi m̀ɓɛ̀mɓɛnɛn ɓi nyìinyìm à rìɓày.
Fɔɔnnɛ tì fyeeghà ajɛ̀m ì maa kìrìŋ; adɛŋ ɗii lɛ Koda, tì ràm tì rùnɛ̀n kìkɔm ki sàg rì ǹtɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey.

Yɛ̀ɛ tì rùnɛ̀ngà kɔ fɔlɔɔ, nni tì kaaghà bee inɛ lɛ, ti sugi mɛ̀ɗig ɓi fìtimà, lɛ tì risìghà lɛ tyɛ̀ ki kɛ̀n ki ɗiŋii ɓi sɛɛ̀sɛɛ anɛ ɓi bèn ì rìɓày ànɛ a Liɓii; nni ɓɛ fumìghà kìlàà ki fitimà; fìtimà fi rɔɓ ki ɓɛ̀nɓɛni fɔlɔɔ fyɔmiɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ bɛ̀ɓ ì ɓaghà di ì mɛ yeesi ɓisi lɛɛ̀gwey, nni ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìmàg ɗi gàɓ ì mɛ̀tɛ̀g ɓi rìɓày ɓi duri tana.
Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn, ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ makì tì ɓyom ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓɛ nkìlàg ɓìsay miì ɓi fìtimà.
Gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru ì ghaghìghà, tyɛ̀ ki ghɛn nsoò kìsaa ki ŋwos, nsoò tyɔɛy, bɛ̀ɓ ì ki kɛ̀nkɛn lɔŋ asu rì ìtèɗ, ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ, tì ɓatìghà ɓi ri ǹtyweeyi wulɛ, tì rì lɛ tì ghɛɓ.

Tì ɓaghà di tì mɛ ghagsi mɛru lɛɛ̀gwey, tyɛ̀ ki ɗi com. Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à pɛ̀sɛǹgà aɗyoo ɓi nyìinnyìm à ɓum, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓìi nghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nkpaa lɛ, tyɛ̀ ki pɛ̀sɛn a Kirɛɗɛ, lɛ i ɓìi ǹwoogh rìkpaa ɗìn, di ɓì yin fɛlɛ ɓi koŋnyoo yɛ̀ɛ ɓì rì lɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ, ɓyɛ̀ ɓi ki ɗimzi ɓyom yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ɓì mɛ ɗimzi ɓi.
Nni m̀ɓɔŋzaagh mìni ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, ɓi siìri mɛ̀rem, lɛ nsoò wààdɛŋ, wàa wu ɓi, lɔŋ fìtimà fyɔrìfyɔ fyɛɛ ɓiì ɗyàŋì.
Ɓi-ru wu gɛɛ̀nɛ, ŋwaà-fìtom a Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à làmii mɛ̀, Bɛ̀ll ànɛ nki ɓɔɔɓɔgsì, àa yùu mɛ̀ jaŋ̀bog,
à kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Pol, kɔ̀ɔ risi, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, u kpaàsɛn ɓi mis mɛ Kaaza, wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓiì ki kàmɛɛ ri ɓyɛɓ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ri ɓɔ ɓi fìtimà ɓisu wɔ̀ɔ̀.
Mìni ɓum! Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sììrii mɛrèm, ɓisuulɛ ǹtyweeyii Bɛ̀ll, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓiì kìlɛɛ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ àa kpaa mɛ̀.
Tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghaatɛɛ ɓi kìrìŋ ki rìɓày kidɛŋ.

Yɛ̀ɛ nyìinyìm à-ru à ɓaghà di à tiì, ɓi rìràɗ mɛru ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì mɛnin ànɛ bɛ̀ɓ ì tumɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rìyeèyèèsì ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn, ànɛ lɛ Mediterane nni ɓɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì-fìtimà ɓɛ wokà yɛ̀ɛ fìtimà fì ti ɓiì wuɓsɛɛ zi ì zɛy.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pikà ǹɗig wu wu ɓaghà wùsuŋɛn gɔ̀g miì ɓi rìɓày, lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ rìrim ɗi mɛnig, nni ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ rìrim di mɛnig ɗi ri ɓɛ̀mità rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛɛdìghà lɛsàg, ɓɛ ghɛn ɓɛ̀mità rìtin ɗì taàraa.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ risìghà lɛ fìtimà fyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki kɛ̀n ki roŋɗɛɛ ɓi mɛ̀ɓan, nni ɓɛ pikà bɔŋ yi yɛɛ̀ rɛsag fitimà yinin ɓi rìɓày, ɓɛ ɓoŋ lɛ duri yɛ̀ɛ taǹ.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀pusì-fìtimà ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ fyèèrɛ̀ngà lɛ, ɓɛɛ naŋ̀ fìtimà ɓɛɛ ghaagh, di ɓɛ mɛ pìg maa kìkɔm àsàg ànɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì nyi ɓi mɛ̀nig rì ǹkpaà lɛ: Ɓɔɔ kɛɛ kì suŋì bɔŋ yi yɛɛ̀ rɛsag fitimà ɓi ǹto wu fitimà,
Pol à kalì ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà lɛ: I ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ rɔɓi ɓi fɛ ɓi fìtimà, di ɓyàa ghɛɓ ɓi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ rengàkà mɛ̀ɗig mɛ mɛ ɓanɓàngà maa kìkɔm ànɛ̀n ɓɛ caɗ lɛ, a ɓɛǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓoŋɓòŋgà lɛ duri yɛ̀ɛ taǹ, nni Pol à cààsìghà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm nyoo lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗi com à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ru ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì mɛnin yɛɛ ti lɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ɓoŋɓoŋ risyɔn, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ɗi nsoò maa com.
Fɔɔnnɛ m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mìni lɛ, ɓi ɗi ɓìɗilàg lɛ ɓi ri mìni rì gɛɓsɛ̀n, wààdɛŋ wàa ɗimzi ɓi nsoò fyòŋ fìfog fi wɔ̀ ɓi ǹto.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à tekà bìrɛs à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à ɓɛg yɔ̀, à tumɛ̀n rìɗi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ìtèɗ wu yughà min ɓɛro ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi nyoo, ɓɛ ɗi girig.
Ɓìsi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ tì ɓaghà ɓi fìtimà, tì ɓaghà ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, rì ɓum mɛ̀tin mɛraa rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì taàfog.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɗighà gàɓ ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ makàkà fàriǹ ɓi rìɓày, lɛ fìtimà fyɛɛ ki yɛ̀ɛ fi fɛmɓɛɛ.

Yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà, ɓɛ̀pusì-fìtimà ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀dìghà ɓi kipisɛn ki zi; yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ pìkà mis, ɓɛ ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ rìɓày à ɗiŋii ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày, bèn ì kìrìŋ kiǹ ì seèsèèrɛ̀ngày gìrig; nni ɓɛ kɔngà lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì rɛsii fitimà wɔɔ di bee i ɓaa.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ fumɓàkà bɔŋ yi yɛɛ̀ rɛsag fitimà, ɓɛ càɗ yɔ wɔɔ ɓi rìɓày, ɓɛ fumɓàg girig mɛ̀ɗig mɛ kikɛ̀ɛ̀sì-fìtimà; yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kighà fɔlɔɔ, nni ɓɛ kagà min maa kìlàà ànɛ asu wu fitimà, lɛ bɛ̀ɓ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ tyɔg fyɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà min ɓi bèn ì rìɓày.

Wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɛ kɛngà ki roŋɗɛɛ ɓi sɛɛ̀sɛɛ, ɓi nyìinyìm à mɛ̀nig. Wɔɔnnɛ fìtimà fi kaɓkà; jàŋ ìnɛ asu ì ɗiŋì ɓi sɛɛ̀sɛɛ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bee inɛ ì ɓatìghà lɛ ì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n tì, jaŋ ìnɛ ajɛ̀m ì siitɛ̀n kì wààrɛɛ, lɛ ɓìkus ɓi riɓày ɓi roòròŋɗɛ̀ngà miì rì ìtèɗ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ wooghrɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ ɓɔɔ cuùsi ɓìmbùŋ ɓìcèm, ɓisuulɛ kidɛŋ ki ɓaghà lɛ ki wɔg ki ki làn.

Kìɓan kifog yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ a ghɛɓsi Pol, nni à rèkà ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛǹ lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kì fɔlɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ à reɓsìghà min ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ yighà kìwɔg lɛ, ɓɛɛ log kì kpìi ɓi rìɓày ɓɛɛ wɔg ɓɛɛ kpaŋ̀ a cɛɗ.
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓɔ kì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii di ɓɛ kɔraagh ɓi mɛ̀ɓam, nsoò ɓi ɓìlànà ɓi fitimà. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kɛngà kìkpaŋì a cɛɗ lɛ soghàsogha.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ghɛɓkàkà fɔlɔɔ lɛ soghàsogha, nni ɓɛ kalìghà ɓìsi lɛ, kìrìŋ ki riɓày kiǹ ki ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Maltɛ.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìrìŋ kiǹ ɓɛ ghaɓkà ɓìsi rì geesɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey; yɛ̀ɛ bwey ì sɛngà, kìfɛɓ ki ki kìki lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ghɛŋzɛ̀ngà coo kikaŋì ki ɗuu, ɓɛ reŋì ɓìsi lɛ, ti kɛǹ kì woògh ɓìsiìcèm.
Pol à raɓkà ǹkun wu tìcaàgh lɛ a foŋ̀ ɓi ɗuu, nni kìgòm ki faŋìghày ɓi ǹkun wu tiwon wìn yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu ɗi komgày kɔ, ki fyuŋ Pol ɓi càg.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày kiǹ ɓɛ ghɛngà di nyoo ìnɛ̀n ì fyufyuŋii Pol fɔlɔɔ ɓi càg, nni ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìkpaakpàà lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ǹwolì-ɓum. Ɓisuulɛ, rìren ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ghɛɛ lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ ɓati ɓi cɛɓ, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛɓiì rìwu ɓi rìɓày.
Wɔ̀lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ Pol à sàɗkà càg, nyoo ì kpì ɓi ɗuu, kɛ̀ɛ ki wog nsoò maa rìkɛŋ.

Nni ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zìghà mis, lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ Pol à ɓiì mìkii, nsoò lɛ yɛ̀ɛ à biì nàrɛɛ à wu; kìɓan kifog, yɛ̀ɛ coo cààmɛ̀n ki ghaghìghà ɓɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ ghɛn kirèmzɛna ki ɓeɓtɛn, ɓɛ lɔɔ̀gh jɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkpaakpàà lɛ, à rì bɛ̀ll ìdɛŋ.
Rìfòm ɗi ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày kiǹ ɗi ɓaghà wɔɔ ri fyòomà jàŋbog; rìfòm diǹ ɗi ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Puɓilyus; ɗi ghaɓkà ɓìsi a mɛɛ mii lɛ syeesyee, tì lay wɔɔ mɛru mɛraa.

Seŋi Puɓilyus à ɓaghà ǹnɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn ɓi zi, lɛ à ɓaghà rì bàɓ-bàɓ ɓi nyoo, ɗùm ɗi bwaɓ ɗi ki kìki nyi. Nni Pol à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa yɛ̀ɛ tààta ànɛ̀n, à ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll, à saghì nyi ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, à wɔ̀ɔ̀zì nyi.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày ɓɛ yughày, à wɔ̀ɔ̀zì girig ɓɔ.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ nyaasìghà ɓìsi lɛɛ̀gwey; yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà di tì ti ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ, ɓɛ faghà ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi kaarɛ̀ngà ɓìsi bisuu rikɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗis.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ghagsìghà ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛraa wɔɔ, nni tì ɓɔkà fìtimà fidɛŋ fi a Alɛgsaŋdirii, fi fi ghagsìghà bùmà wɔɔ ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày kiǹ. Fìtimà fiǹ fi ɓaghà ɗii lɛ, bɛ̀ll yi rifas.
Yɛ̀ɛ fìtimà fiǹ fi rɛlìghà ɓi bàn ìnɛ lɛ Sirakuuzɛ, nni tì kɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ mɛ̀ru mɛraa.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo, tì sòrì bèn ì rìɓày, tì kɛ̀n kìkpaŋì a Regyo. Bi duri tana, bɛ̀ɓ ì tumɛ̀ngà rìfɛɓsìì duŋzi, ɓìsii kɛǹ min kikpaŋì a Puzɔl ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛɓɛɛ̀.
Tì tanɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ righerɛ̀n wɔɔ ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n, ɓɛ tɔg ɓìsi lɛ ti lay mɛ̀ru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a lɔ̀ŋkaa, fɔɔnnɛ tì ki kɛ̀ngà a Rom.

Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ a Rom ɓɛ wokà lɛ tì kpaŋi, ɓɛ yughà ɓìsi kì ɓoŋì a fyèè fi Apiyus, rì ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì ɓaghà ɗii lɛ: Naa yi ɓɛ̀kèn yiraa. Yɛ̀ɛ Pol à ghɛngà ɓɔ, à tògsàg Bɛ̀ll, nyoo yìì i tèèsɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì kpagà a Rom, ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà à sɛdɛ̀ngà ɓimbùŋ rì ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n àgwey, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ caɗ Pol lɛ a kɔri cɛ̀ncii, rì sujàà ànɛ à ɓèŋɓèŋgà nyi.

Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛ̀ra, Pol à lààghràkà ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà, nni Pol à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ǹkìi ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kis kiɓan kiɓeɓtɛn, kɛ̀ɛ nki yogsi ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓɛseŋi ɓis. Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ ɓangà mɛ̀ a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ kaàɓ mɛ̀ rì Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ ɓɛ tɔkàkà mɛ̀ mɛ̀tɔɔ̀tɔɔgh ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn kiɓan kiɓeɓtɛn kì ǹkìi, ki ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ǹwolɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ kìghà lɛ, ɓɛɛ caɗ mɛ̀,
kìɓan kifog Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓeǹ lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ càɗ mɛ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ǹtiniyɛn lɛ nghagsiì kìɓan kɛm̀ yɛ̀ɛ Kaaza. Ǹki yin rì fèg ànɛ lɛ, ǹsɔmɛn ɓumɓɛ ɓi kilɔ̀ŋ kɛm̀.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki mɛ̀ɛ ntɔɔgh lɛ di màa ghɛɛ mìni, ǹkalì mìni lɛ bɛn yi ǹɗì yi rì yɔ, yi ri ɓisuu ǹtyweeyi wu Isirayɛl a rì rì wɔ.
Nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Ɓìsii ghɛɛ ɓi kaàtà àdɛŋ ànɛ à rìì a Zyude à ɓùŋ kìɓan kɔɔ nsoò ŋwaàdɛŋ à yùu ɓi fɛ, à kpaa kìɓan à ràɗ rì wɔ̀.
Ɓìsiì kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ti wog ɓi ŋwɔm wɔɔ com ki wɔ̀ɔ fèfèg, ɓisuulɛ tì yii lɛ bee inɛ̀n, ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ ɗùùɗuu ri yɔ̀ jàŋbimiɗ.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ faghà nyi ǹkàg wulɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛnɛn, nni ɓɛ yughày kìtuu lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ nyi a mɛɛ mii. Ɓi ɓìtòkì ɓii, Pol à kalìghà ɓɔ kìɓan ki ki taataa kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, à ki kaakaa bee lɛ rì ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, rì ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, lɛ a ki lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ teeti nyoey ɓi kìɓan ki Yeesus. A tòkàkà rì ɓɔ fɔlɔɔ à tumɛ̀n sariwa à kpaŋ cɛŋkò.
Gàɓ ìdɛŋ ì gherɛ̀ngà ɓìɓan ɓi à kpaakpààghà, wɔlɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ teɗ nyoey.

Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà rìsug, di ɓɛ mɛ rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ wooghrɛn jɛ̀ɛ̀, com ki Pol à kpaatìghà ɓɔ ki ɓaghà lɛ: Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki kpaghà lɔŋ saaɗ yɛ̀ɛ ki kalìghà rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓi ŋwɔm wu ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii lɛ:
Kɛ̀na u kpaà kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ lɛ: Ɓì ɓiì ɓaà lɛ ɓì soo woogh lɛ syeesyee kɛ̀ ɓi yì, ɓì ri ki seesèè lɛ syeesyee kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛn
ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki, mɛ tɔgtii ɓi, ɓɛ mɛ simgi dɔm ɓi mɛ̀reè ɓɛ ki ɓuusag mis lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛnɛn, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi kiɓan ɗi nɗem, lɛ i ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛɛ mɛ̀rem ǹwɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓɔ.
Nni yiina min lɛ, ɓɔlɛ̀ à gòri ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ, à mɛ romɓɛn a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. Nsoò ɓɔ, ɓɛ ri nyi ɓiì ghàɓi.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pol à kpaghà fɔlɔɔ, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà ɗì rìghaàgh di ɓɛɛ̀ nyoonyolɛ̀n ɓɔrìɓɔ rì ìtèɗ.
Pol à kɔ̀rìghà ɓɛ̀bimiɗ ɓɛ bèg ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓi naa ìnɛ à rɛntìghà. Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ yuyùghày nyi kìghɛɛ̀ à tetèkà ɓɔ rì kìnyàà.
A lààlàmɓɛ̀n kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, à ki rèresi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi seesee Kan Yeesus Kiris lèg bimiɗ ànɛ ki ɓaghà lɛ ki kɔ̀n nyi, kɛ̀ɛ̀ ntɔɓ.
